name: Krishun Hudson
text: The staff and manager are always very friendly and keeps a smile on their faces. Always feel welcome everytime. Also, the food is always made with fresh ingredients and always on time. If anyone does have a problem, they take care of and your issues with no hesitation. The Pizza Hut in Montevallo Al is absolutely the best. We love our Hut!!!

name: Otis Geystan
text: I try my best to give Pizza Hut my service but every time there is a problem. My food showed up cold because as the driver said “Someone didn’t put the wings in the bag with the pizza, so he had to go back to the store to get them”. After waiting almost two hours I called just to be told “there’s no orders on the table it should be on the way”. Still didn’t get everything I paid for. The only reason they got one star is because the delivery driver was cool even though he had to deliver in the rain. The Pizza Hut in Montevallo needs new management. I know it was the manager that answered the phone and customer service isn’t for her.

name: Christian Buckner
text: No masks, requested curbside and waited 10 min before going inside as no employees were looking outside. Not busy. Food was great.

name: Courtney Baugh
text: I have attempted to give this location so many chances. Literally the worst Pizza Hut I have used. This last time I ordered delivery and got a call that their delivery guy didn’t show and it would be 3 before they had a driver. Mind you this whole call the lady was so rude about the situation. I load up the kids to go pick up my order I walk in she doesn’t even ask who I am just grabs $3 from the drawer and hands me pizza. Again I never even told her my name so I could have been anyone. And then I witnessed her being extremely rude to an elderly gentleman that was ordering. After the man order he kindly let her know that they were going to sit in the car and she shrugs her shoulders and says AND I DONT CARE. Also the pizza had a weird aftertaste that tasted like alcohol.

name: Jazzy L
text: The staff is rude especially the people who work on the phones. My pizza and pasta is always dry carry out or delivery. They don’t have their curbside pickup sign up. -12/10 on customer service. -50/100 for food quality.

name: Kristy Edwards
text: I did curb side pick up. I called when I got there and they told me it would be two minutes. I waited 15 minutes before trying to call again. No one answered so I got out and went in and my food had been sitting in the warmer the whole time. This store is understaffed. The food was delicious but the service was bad.

name: Dericc Williams
text: Bad attitudes rude and the owner must not care about their store ...how do you order extra cheese and get more cheese without asking for extra..when you have people working jst too get a check and don't understand that if your costumers are not happy you don't get a check and your store closes like the others

name: Courtney Sparks
text: So all of my food was great, but i ordered bread sticks with an extra marinara. Both marinara cups were barely filled, i poured both of them together and didnt even have half the container filled. Other than that the food was good and the customer service was great. Just feel like i shouldnt of had to pay for an extra sauce that literally had a tablespoons worth in the cup.

name: Dericc Williams
text: Bad attitudes rude and the owner must not care about their store ...how do you order extra cheese and get more cheese without asking for extra..when you have people working jst too get a check and don't understand that if your costumers are not happy you don't get a check and your store closes like the others

name: Susie Smith
text: This location does an awesome job!  The delivery driver was nice and the pizza was great.

name: Courtney Sparks
text: So all of my food was great, but i ordered bread sticks with an extra marinara. Both marinara cups were barely filled, i poured both of them together and didnt even have half the container filled. Other than that the food was good and the customer service was great. Just feel like i shouldnt of had to pay for an extra sauce that literally had a tablespoons worth in the cup.

name: Squeakyyr 4 Brown
text: None of the employees wore gloves or mask...

name: Erick Shields
text: Great atmosphere and very affable service. The meals were crisp and yummy. Will definitely recommend this place to friends and family. Affordable prices and large portions. Great job.

name: Harold Hickman
text: This place is worth giving a shot. They have big portions for convenient rates. Always clean and with fantastic character. Will visit here again.

name: Shawn Romanstine
text: Ordered online 2 medium speciality and recv 1 cheese and 1 sausage but was charged for speciality. The person working said I got what I ordered. Ok but why did I pay for what I didn't get? The 2nd time in a row my order was wrong!!! Now to the top!

name: Kolton Buck
text: I simply like their food. I always get great customer service there. The place is clean and the staff members are always helpful. I highly recommend this place.

name: Brenda Brown
text: Best pizza I've had in a long time

name: keepcoolalive
text: Pretty sure I’ve gotten sick the last two times I’ve eaten here. Completely strengthened my fear of getting food from anywhere other than MY kitchen.

name: sonido pachuko king
text: Terrible service, they don't know how to place an order and rude manager has NO professionalism

name: Zac Copeland
text: Can't ever get instructions right, such as a regular Dr.Pepper not a Diet, can't seem to remember to put the garlic crust flavor on a stuffed crust pizza, brought a sierra mist the other day when asked for Mt. Dew. Its the simple things really.

name: Stephanie Thacker
text: Absurd service! Waited over an hour AFTER the pizza was out for delivery. They forgot our drink. When we called, the manager was rude and wouldn’t contact the delivery driver to bring one. So we asked just to be credited the couple dollars for it. They charged my card without asking an extra $10 because it “changed the special” without the drink that THEY forgot. So I paid $49 for 2 cold pizzas. I’ll stick to papa Johns from now on.

name: s8vy15
text: Went in earlier today and placed an order for our youth football team. We ordered 6 pizzas and stressed they needed to be delievered there at a certain time and was told they would be. Called for 15 minutes to FINALLY have the actual store answer to tell us our order was still sitting in the store at the time they were SUPPOSED to be delivered and waiting on a driver. Really this was PRE ORDERED!!!  This is ridiculous the way their service is.

name: Randy Hatcher
text: Ordered pizza got home only half toppings on it plus IT WAS burnt so bad it was black no sauce on it at all call up there talked to TOM the manager and was told I have to drive back 15 mins 1 way to fix there problem and the guy told me oh well it is what it is. Ya never again will i do business with them.

name: Deanna Davenport
text: Terrible service. Ordered a simple pizza over the phone, got to business after 30 mins and they had my number saved and NO pizza. Had to "reorder" and still tried to charge full price with no apologies of the long wait!

name: Michael Patton
text:
Mobile app wouldn't let me cancel a double-clicked order which would have cost 10.90.  Called and they got light sauce confused with extra sauce.  The cost was 12.46.  Got home to a pizza I didn't eat but two bites of.

I won't ever order via phone again.  Hope the app works better someday.

name: Corey Baginski
text:
Had been ordering delivery from here for quite a while. Called in my order tonight and was told they didn't have any delivery drivers. On a Saturday night. There must be something wrong with either what they pay, or whoever answered the phone didn't give a $#!+.
Please remove the delivery option from your website.
Thank you, Domino's, for delivering.

name: Joey Icolano
text: Love the new location!  Fast friendly service.  Great value from the $5 Flavor Menu

name: Whit Russell
text: This place is been doing very good pizza in town for a very long time. They moved to a new location a couple of years ago, but it's the same franchise.

name: Robin Simmons
text: I enjoyed the convenience of ordering online. Pizza hut in Montevallo did a wonderful job. The service was great and the food was delicious!

name: R B
text: Ordered three pizzas, all three were over cooked, all three pizzas were not cut all the way through and very difficult to cut. I had my elderly father pick up the pizza due me being ill and needing to feed the kids. My dad didn’t look at the pizza or didn’t realize how over cooked it was and he had no way of knowing about the pizzas not being cut through. Regardless it should have not been served to customers. I called to address the issue the manger did not apologize once, in fact he sounded like he didn’t care at all. He just offered a credit for one pizza. I was suppose to have a credit from their last mess up, but didn’t push it and wanted to give them another try when placing the order. Whoever is in charge at the moment is doing a terrible job.

name: Mustang Concepts
text:
Worst EVER!!! Ordered pizza, waited 101 minutes for said pizza to arrive. Needless to say the pies  resembled cardboard wheels with cheese. As for the bread sticks, well they would have served a better purpose as rubber chew toys for the pooch!! I called the store and waited 27 minutes to speak to a manager, only to have the phone hung up by some over achieving pizza clerk who didn't even bother to check if someone was on the line. HELLOOOOOOO!!!!!!!.
YOU CANT FIX STUPID and for a college town, there sure are a LOT of IGNORANT people here!!!

name: Kathy Hughes
text: Pizza is soggy. Has large chunks of green peppers.The cinnamon bread is good and the delivery drive was nice.

name: Taylor Coe
text: Terrible. Used to work there and it’s only gone downhill. Had a two and a half hour wait for just wings and fries. Would have picked it up but the woman on the phone claimed my number didn’t work. I don’t even like the pizza, but the wings are much better than Dominoes.

name: Dinki Wheeler
text: Good service hot food just the calzones had barely any meat or cheese

name: Mary Bullard
text: Tonight was awful. Ordered a BBQ beef pizza and got delivered a pizza with bbq sauce an cheese. Called back up there an was put on hold because they were cleaning up. So.i pulled up at 9:58 an they were supposed to close at 10.. sorry but yall bout to make me the correct pizza. The manager Tracy was very rude she was from the prattville pizza hut.

text: If zero/negative stars was an option that’s what they’d get

PIZZA HUT IS AWEFULL.
THE PRICE GOES UP AND THE AMOUNT OF TOPPINGS GOES DOWN.
WE ORDER HALF EVERYTHING AND THERE IS BARELY ANYTHING

GO TO JENNY CAN COOK AND FIND HER PIZZA CRUST RECIEPE   IT IS FAST AND DELISH
ANYTHING IS BETTER THAN THIS POS PIZZA PLACE

After waiting almost two hours I called just to be told “there’s no orders on the table it should be on the way”. Still didn’t get everything I paid for. The only reason they got one star is because the delivery driver was cool even though he had to deliver in the rain. The Pizza Hut in Montevallo needs new management. I know it was the manager that answered the phone and customer service isn’t for her.

I load up the kids to go pick up my order I walk in she doesn’t even ask who I am just grabs $3 from the drawer and hands me pizza. Again I never even told her my name so I could have been anyone. And then I witnessed her being extremely rude to an elderly gentleman that was ordering. After the man order he kindly let her know that they were going to sit in the car and she shrugs her shoulders and says AND I DONT CARE. Also the pizza had a weird aftertaste that tasted like alcohol.

All in all it was a pretty outstanding shop, they sell by the slice, so make a great lunch option.

name: Wolf Bentley
text: I ordered 2 pizzas...got  correct and one I didnt order at all. Took over 7 minutes to decide if they was going to make my order correct. They need to understand that a red sanitation bucket full of fluid and a dirty cloth doesn't need to be on the table where the pizza dough is being prepared..managers everywhere..

name: Aimee M Orris
text:
I swear the man was RUNNING!
When I saw the business owner literally running around downtown to deliver orders, I just knew that was going to be a great meal! I swear, he was really running! Not driving, not walking, the man was running. I HAD to order from them. In fact, everyone in our offices has ordered from them now, and all of the food has been fantastic. The meal is always hot, cooked well, and so VERY tasty! Mouth watering pizza, soul stirring parmesan bread bites, and cinnamon twists that will make your eyes roll! Also, try the chicken with the roasted tomatoes and bacon grilled on top; it was a fresh take on pizza delivery. I've heard that the owners of this new store are already very active in our community, which is another great reason to support them. So RUN! Don't WALK! Run to the phone, computer, or drive thru and order from this Domino's Pizza now. You'll thank me for it later!

name: Kevin Gardner
text: Visited this shop the week they opened. Full of bright-eyed and eager employees! Great pizza and smile abound. They were not available for online orders yet, however they took my phone order like a champ and got my food ready in 10 minutes. The pickup window is awesome with a big red arrow as signage pointing to it. So awesome to see a big chain restaurant in downtown Childersburg!

name: Brittany Haynes
text: Outstanding customer service. Store manager Corey went above and beyond to remedy a misunderstanding before a complaint was ever made, all while the location is new to the city and quite busy. Would give more stars if I could

name: Kaye Newman
text: Employees are really nice. Food was hot and delicious.

name: Misty Greene
text: Great service,  friendly staff, great food.

name: Josh Ganey
text: Very good and fast deliver

name: Michelle Owens
text: If you're thinking of ordering pizza at the Domino's Pizza in Priceville, AL, you're better off ordering from somewhere else. My first encounter with them, I placed an online order 30 minutes before closing, & was told they couldn't complete my order, even though it showed online that they could. On top of that, I was STILL charged for my order...that I never received! Yeah...I'm not even joking. I received a phone call telling me they already closed off orders or something, but that my card had been charged. I was like..."Whaaattt??!!" How can I be charged for food I never received?? I mentioned that they didn't close until midnight, & he said that was correct, but because they don't "normally" get orders that late, they had already closed off orders or whatever he said. I guess he's never heard of people that work second shift?? So, now I'm out $22.00 & no food! Beware!

resp.text:
Michelle Owens
I am very sorry to hear about your experience.  We want to make this right.  Please email us at teamdaks.customercare@gmail.com so we can look into the matter.  Please include what store you shop with, your phone number and address so we can fully address this for you.

name: Richard Shepard
text: Just an awesome place to stop on your way home from work and grab a pizza. The pizza is always hot and fresh. This place deserves 5/5.

resp.text:
Richard Shepard
We work hard to earn your 5 star and seeing your review means everything to us. Your feedback will be used in in continued training at the store level as we strive to provide a great meal and service to our community.
THANK YOU!

name: Kevin Breuers
text: Still have some kinks to work out. Ordered contact less pickup. After some time with no contact went to window.  Saw 4 workers talking at counter who could have run my pizza out.  .  Pizza toppings all slid to side because of huge pizza bubbles in crust.

resp.text:
Kevin Breuers
Thanks for choosing us and your review is very important. I apologize your experience was not at a 5 star level and I want to make things right. Can you email me at teamdaks.customercare@gmail.com when you have a moment so I know exactly what happened and how I can fix this?

name: joe voll
text: If I can put negative stars I would.  I am an over the road truck driver.  The person on the phone said that they are not aloud to deliver to my truck and that I would have to leave my truck and walk across a busy street and then wait there to get my delivery then I would have to walk back across the street with my food in hand to get back to my truck.  I always call and order when I am in a different location and it never seems to be a problem to deliver to an 18-wheeler. All the other location I have gone to in Alabama do not have a problem with.   What a waste of time to call this place or even order from them.

name: DJ Seavey
text: Called to order at 7:22p...got a call 20 minutes later from the store telling me the delivery driver called in. So my pizza would be late. It's now p almost midnight. No food. I've called a couple times. They stopped answering. I called from a different phone and voila, they answered. I asked where my food is. They put me on hold and never got back to me...

resp.text: We are so sorry you did not experience exceptional service from us. We hope to gather some more details from you to address this issue. If you could send us an email with your contact information to Dominos5816@5-StarPizza.com so we can look further into this, please. Thank you for your time and have a great day!

name: Jason Sharitt
text:
Used the app to place an order at 6:44 Saturday evening from a house party. Socialized with friends for a while and saw two missed calls a few minutes later at 6:53. No voicemails but I figured it had to be Domino’s so I called back. Waited for 10 minutes and no one picked up. App said pizza was being delivered. Called back at 7:26 to see where food was. Finally got someone on the phone. The gentleman said he tried calling twice to tell me there were no delivery drivers available. But he could’ve left a voicemail for that! Why did I have to try and call him back for that information? At this point we’re all hungry and now the guests are upset.

So a few things here:
1. The app shouldn’t show my food is being delivered when it hasn’t even been made.
2. I shouldn’t have been able to order delivery if the location doesn’t offer it.
3. The employee should have left a voicemail with the information and not wasted my time trying to call back for it.

So be careful using this location. The communication is very poor. Call ahead of time to see if they can deliver. Don’t use the app.

EDIT: Bumping up a star since the manager called me to explain the situation and obviously wants to make things right. I may give this location another try since it seems I caught them in a perfect storm of "things going wrong", and being a former restaurant worker myself, I can sympathize.

My order was flagged for review since it was associated to an address that has been linked to multiple phone numbers. This is a national Domino's corporate policy to keep tabs on potential sketchy orders.

Domino's corporate always expects their franchisees to have delivery drivers, and never anticipates a scenario where a given store has no delivery drivers show up for work. So don't expect the app design to improve, and I can't fault this location for that.

Domino's typically doesn't leave voicemails as they prefer to talk about potential order problems in person, and in my case, try to present an offer for me to pick up the pizza myself. Even so, we'll agree to disagree as the voicemail could have said "We have no delivery drivers for tonight. Please call us back by X time if you still want the order and can arrange to have it picked up."

resp.text: Our team appreciates your review and feedback. We apologize for not earning a 5-star review from you and want you to know we will be working hard to earn your 5-star review from you. Thank you and have a great day, Jason!

I order my pizza again and the tracker says it has been delivered. 30 minutes later- still no pizza. I was left on hold for 20 minutes or so and called back several times with no answer. I love dominos, but I hate to say I won’t be ordering from this store anymore. Save your money!!

Dominos doesn't hold a candle.....their staff seemed annoyed at the request.    GREAT JOB!!  Marco's is the best!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback, Linda—so glad to see it!

text: The food here is slamming.....So good to me...Wings on point pizza on point....It was my first time ordering and my son and I loved it.....I had to eat it again a second time it was too good....Ooohhh baby that cheese bread with triple the cheese was jumping......The wings are plump and good.....I dont like the fact they didnt toss my wings.....I dont know if thats how they make em however u can tell the sauce was squirted on them......I like my wings tossed in sauce......Other than that good food...Even when delivered at night it was fresh and hot....Good job 👏 👍 guys keep it up...

resp.text: Hi, Twyla. We're so happy you had an excellent experience! Thanks for the review! We really appreciate it.

text: Tried this place a few times and each time was bad.  Food was ok but no customer service.  Two employees were having an argument the first time we went.  The last experience, I tried to call in an order and after being on hold for over 5 minutes I was hung up on.  Tried to call back and went straight to being on hold.   Love Pizza Hut but not this one.

name: Logan Fisher
text: I was told the pizza would be ready by 6:45 PM, yet I was told it would be an extra fifteen minutes. I came back in at 7:00 PM waited ten minutes to be helped, then told it would be another ten minutes till the pizza arrived. It is currently now almost an hour since we told it would be ready and at 8:00 PM it would be two hours since we ordered. I would not and I mean absolutely would not recommend this place!

name: Ashley Holliday
text: Great service! A big shout out to Jennifer and the rest of the crew for being so fast, friendly and courteous. Vernon, Alabama has by far the best Pizza Hut we have ever eaten at. The toppings taste fresh and and the staff go above and beyond. Thanks again for another great supper!

We just got up and left and I called Winfield Pizza Hut and ordered. I will never be back again to Vernin Pizza Hut! It's like that every time I've ever been there. 😠

text: The absolutely best pizza and cheese sticks. I got the best deal and my pizza was ready in ten minutes. Very friendly and helpful staff.

name: Kendrick Curry
text: I was supposed to take a picture before I ate it... 😓 But it was perfect fresh out of the oven. 🤤... My review: I messed my order up, my online receipt said I messed  my order up... I was going to take the "not my favorite pizza" but the guy who was working offered to fix it. 🤯 Was not expecting that especially since it was my fault and I didn't make a big deal about it. He said he wanted me happy. 🤯 I always get good service and pizza from this location and always end happy. I don't know his name I'm assuming he's the manager as I always see him working late. The last time he helped me was a year ago, when we talked about their wings being fried, and we agreed that baked soggy wings are the worst. I was impressed he took the time out to talk to me and explain their products when he was busy. A year later he's still great and helped me tonight. I felt compelled to leave a review and tip better next time. I took this opportunity to point out to my wife that this was why I tip even if I'm just picking up pizza.

text: When I place a delivery order it always take two hours if not longer. When it gets here the pizza is freezing like the driver has been driving around. This place is horrible. Dominos is the best!

name: Brannan Kramer
text: Unacceptable Experience: Placed online order for delivery at 6:16P.M. on a Monday and didn't receive order until 8:26P.M. I called to ask about my order at 7:55P.M. and was told that they were out of the Meaty Marinara pasta I had ordered. They replaced my order and delivered my food to me. I understand busy evenings and being cripplingly short staffed. I worked a pizza place for years. What is absolutely unacceptable about my experience was the lack of communication. As soon as my order was received I should've been called and informed that there was no Meaty Marinara. As soon as any order hits 45 minutes elapsed there should be a call to inform and reassure the customer that there order is on the way. Really disappointed in the management tonight.

name: Jackie Cottingham
text: Great customer  service and pizza  was great

name: Florence Muhindi
text: I made a delivery order from this location, and the people that work here told me that they couldn’t deliver my order to me because their driver had car problems..... so basically they only have one driver in the whole store so I never got my order

name: Nancy Stephens
text: Order medium pizza with cinnamons sticks to go. Food was good, but when I ordered on the website it told me how many minutes it was going to take to be ready. But no where did it say to call when you arrive in the parking lot. I am only complaining because I have ordered before and my pizza was brought out to me without me calling that I was in the parking lot.

name: Donnie
text:
I ordered a specific pizza from the app, asked while picking up the pizza if it was that pizza, the guy running the register (and by running I mean he was kicked back with headphones in) tells me that it is that pizza.

I go home, discover that it a different pizza, call the store to ask about it, and a woman asks if I ordered from the app. I say yeah and she says they don't even serve that food and I shouldn't have ordered from the app.

The receipt clearly says what it was supposed to be. So instead of just not selling me that pizza, they make me a wrong pizza, charge me for it, and won't give a refund. I'm never using this Pizza Hut again.

Update - I gave this Pizza Hut another chance since I was ordering for my father-in-law and it was the closest one to him. I don't know if it's an app problem or what, but I got the wrong order again. Whoever answered the phone did offer me a refund, but I am definitely ruling this place out. Spent almost 50 bucks the first time, and only 12 this time. Both wrong and not worth the hassle of trying to get the right food. I will just order from the one a few miles away in Helena, which has always been reliable.

name: Brian Davis
text: Prompt polite service. 😎

name: Jacquelyn Craig
text: Staff always friendly

name: Russell Morse
text: Fast friendly and always on time

name: Andrew Edwards
text: Incredible , as always.  They were out of large dough and gave me 2 mediums ...  No complaints at all!!

name: Rachel Cattell
text: Pizza is good, but they were not very helpful. My husband ordered a pizza, and it was missing some ingredients. We called, and they didn’t apologize at all. The employee didn’t apologize and the manager didn’t either. They just said you have to bring the pizza back in or we can’t remake it for you. Even though coronavirus is going around, they said it’s company policy to bring the pizza back into the store. I don’t really believe that, and will be emailing the company. We order here frequently, and never had a bad experience until today.

name: Faireca Anderson
text: Great curbside service. The pizza was a little dry but still good.  The wings were a hit!!

text: This location always gets my order right. My order is always fresh and the wait time is no longer than 15 minutes for any order. Awesome staff and clean restaurant. I highly recommend

text: I asked for extra extra extra extra sauce. It doesn't look like I got any sauce.

name: Cecilia Lopez
text: They were super busy, but gave great customer service. Good job!

name: John Jackson
text: Very well organised and convenient place. They serve big meals and for inexpensive prices. We liked the food a lot and the staff members were very friendly and chatty. Will definitely recommend this place.

name: Randall Murphy
text: I remember at a time when Pizza Hut took pride in their pizza. We just ordered pizza and picked it up within 20 minutes after placing the order. Pizza looked and tasted old, was not even cut properly and poorly prepared. I am completely disappointed in the direction this company continues to go down. We basically ate cardboard with a little bit of tomato sauce and a few toppings. Do better Pizza Hut!

name: Patrick Knotts
text:
When the app says 30 to 40 minutes on delivery and your pixza shows up almost two hours later,  there is definitely a customer service disconnect somewhere. Customers understand busy if they are accurately informed.  You have my phone number,  give a courtesy call and you can gain repeat  business. Keep this up and I'll be headed elsewhere for pizza delivery.
****Update - they have improved noticeably. I am giving them more chances especially the rapper.

name: sierra gutierrez
text: So I had ordered a pizza last night from you guys around 9:30ish or so and got it in all great timing but my only issue was your driver first she tried handing me the wrong order and insisted I was wrong & that it was mine for about a few minutes finally after I showed her the receipt online she had made a phone call to a manager to make sure then had finally brought me my food. but all I'm saying you guys should really pay attention to who y'all hire this lady was really high on drugs  or something the way she was acting and moving her jaw was out of control! Very very uncomfortable

name: Len Brown
text: They can not deliver a pizza to the correct address and by the time I call  and they get someone to my correct address the pizza is cold.  I will never use them again.

name: TheCool Mom
text: Pizza is great, however customer service is not so good. The girl at the cash register (Ashley Tatum) was not friendly at all, she didn’t greet me. I said “Hey how are you?” she didn’t say anything. My order was “ready” on the screen but she told me I had to wait because it wasn’t ready. She just looked like she’d rather be somewhere else. No smiles, etc.

name: DeAnna Grayson
text: Fresh. Hot. Friendly. Recommend.

name: Kim Cook
text: Wow...Pizza Hut has really gone downhill. Need new management. Spent 30.00 on 2 pizzas and I could have gone somewhere else and received good pizza for that price. We ordered the BBQ pizza and have been getting it for years. It has always been good but this was dry, hardly any sauce and they forgot the cheese. Worst pizza ever. Pizza Hut has lost my business....it and because it used to be a great pizza place.

text: I don't know if there are short handed but I order @ 5:50 pm and 7:20 may food still deliver. I called and couldn't get anyone to answer the phone so I could cancel my order

name: sean thomas
text: The 5 dollar deal is pretty good. I ordered pizza, garlic knots, and wings. Guy behind counter brought me pizza and knots. I told him I also had wings. He didn't look happy. He threw some wings in a container and shook them for maybe 5 seconds. There was no garlic parmesan sauce on the wings.

text: The food has been hot and consistent the last few times

name: Andrew Ryan did nothing wrong
text: Pizza Hut Alabaster is really a joke. I've never had a good experience with them. They're always late. I've had pizza delivered twice that looked like the box was shaken and the pizza looked like a ball of crumbled paper. Both times this happened they said sorry and didn't offer a refund or to bring another pizza. The bread is always under cooked. At the moment I'm waiting on a order that's 45 minutes late so far. Order from Domino's and you'll be better off.

name: Josh Buchanan
text: Ordered online three times and all three times the pizza was hot and ready when I arrived. The person helping me always goes over the order to make sure everything is as it should be. great location that is hardly ever busy so its in and out quickly every time.

name: Charles Williams Jr.
text: Bad bad business waited over an hour for delivery ... for food.... called back and they placed us on long hold ... gave fake names.. and mocked us laughing in background.. then finally asked us did we wanna cancel a $45 order.. wow really need to talk to corporate... will never ever have to worry about us again...

name: Dawn Cook

name: ricardo perez
text: They need a responsible manager yesterday we called from home no answer we drove to pizza as we went we called and no answer... We walked in no one was at front desk!!!! so I called standing in front desk no sound of phone ringing, I looked to the back the guy that had taken our order  and made the  pizza after seen us... had head phones on so didn't even look up for about almost 10 mins... After I told him about the phone calls he started answering the phone and wanted to give me a free coke to compensate, but I didn't take it I could have been home waiting for my pizza to be delivered but that was not going to be possible due untrained irresponsible personal.. this is not the first time not to long ago we called no answer so we drove to pizza hut and the person was seating out side with Jimmy John's employee like nothing was going on laughing.... Like I said they need a manager  a real manager in there!!!

Yall need to get some good people to work there and treat them well so they will help the blonde hair delivery girl out.

text: Got good wings and pizza...

name: Mikal Hardeman
text: Drivers pulling out in front of other drivers on highway almost causing an accident

resp.text: Hi, Mikal. Thank you so much for bringing this to our attention. Please fill out this form to create documentation in your own words regarding this concern. www.tellmarcos.com

name: Fat Farm Fishing (Arc Aerial)
text: I was excited to hear they were opening near us! I live 5 minutes in a straight shot from this restaurant and they don’t deliver here. 4 Pizza Pirates directly across the street from Marcos delivers here. If you wouldn't consider delivery 5 miles i would not consider doing business with you.

resp.text: Aaron, we apologize for the inconvenience. Our stores have specific areas where delivery is available.  We’d be happy to assist with a carryout order.

name: Kameal Lee
text: This is the most unprofessional place to get any food from...There very rude and all need to be retrained on how to work in the plubic..The crew manger is very unprofessional (Jeff) definitely need a new leader..besides him.

resp.text: Hello, Kameal. We take these things very seriously and want to know more. Please tell us about your experience on our feedback form at www.tellmarcos.com.

name: Stephen Bermudez
text: We ordered a pepperoni and one of their specialty pizzas. The pepperonis were smaller but there were loads of them. We got curbside carryout and the whole process was smooth and easy. The food/price is decent, but use a coupon and 👍🏻👍🏻. Overall a good addition to the 431/165 area.

name: Samir Mewar
text: Excellent veggie pizza...great service..very clean

resp.text: Samir, we're so happy you had an excellent experience! Thanks for the review! We really appreciate it.

name: Joshua Hines
text: Great food

resp.text: Hi, Joshua! This is the feedback we love to see—thank you so much!

name: William Daniell
text: Excellent service, ready when promised and outstanding quality.

resp.text: Hi William. We're so happy you had an excellent experience! Thanks for the review! We really appreciate it.

name: Codi Burford
text: I agree with Aaron. 4 Pizza Pirates delivers to me as well and their pizza is always hot, but I would love something different. I was excited to have something new in the Seale area as well even if it was another pizza place, but the delivery criteria Marcos has seems ridiculous and will prevent me from doing business because of the inconvience the drive has to make. 4 Pizza Pirates will continue getting my business every week until I decide to carry out. It's a shame. A suggestion should be recommended to corporate.

resp.text: Codi, we apologize for any inconvenience. Our stores have specific areas where delivery is available.

name: Sharon Thacker
text: Everything was hot and fresh! Customer service was Excellent! They even called to let me know my food was ready for pick up thru the drive thru window.

resp.text: Hi, Sharon! This is what we love to hear—so glad you had a good experience!

name: T Porter
text: Fast delivery and pizza is always hot and delicious. 😋😋

name: Tredis Stanley
text: Good customer service

resp.text: Hi Tredis. Thanks for the great feedback—so glad to hear you had a good experience!

name: Anita Johnson
text: My favorite !!

resp.text: This is the feedback we love to see—thanks so much, Anita!

name: J Edi
text: Pizza is decent for price. But this location has misquoted ready time 2x for pick up as well as 2x for delivery. On both pick up occasions the pizza was not even put in the oven until after I had been in the store for 5+ min and I came in after my quoted ready time. My time is valuable and I had other things to do which then included making other meal arrangements. 1/8/18 I spoke with Reggie "manager" who literally placed my pizza in the oven while I waited for a  response to my ready inquiry. I am very displeased.

resp.text: J Hut I want to fix this!  Please follow this link http://www.hungryhowies.com/contact-us-0  and provide me with some details about your experience.  SO SORRY! -HOWARD

name: Jake Balam
text: Ice cold pizza that looked like my 7 year old cut, box was smashed. Didn't bring ranch cups.

name: Kimberly Small
text: Great pizza, love the crust. The service is okay. Maybe understaffed.

resp.text: Kimberly  🤔 How can we up our ⭐️ game? -HOWARD

name: Daniel Lindley
text: Got our pizzas almost 1hr and 30 mins after called. Then didnt get our drink . So the delivery driver went to walmart and bought one. Brought it back but it was hot.

name: Ella Hood
text: We love Hungry Howies! They deliver fresh hot subs and pizzas 10 miles away from the store within 30 minutes. Their drivers are always nice and friendly!

name: Lyndsey Patton
text: 1 star is only bc I had to drive such a short distance (4.6 miles) after being told we weren’t in range for delivery. Honestly, if you’re out for pickup I would definitely order at another location other than this one. Service was HORRIBLE. First I called and I called on a landline phone so there would be no issue, well the person taking my order had to have been deaf bc I repeated each word of my sentence at least 3 times and then hung up in my face. So I call another location in Tuscaloosa and the guy that answered the phone there was so nice and told me that we were too far away but he was gonna check the other stores to see which delivery range we were in and he came back and said we were in range for delivery from this location. So I call back and was told again I was not in range, very confused at this point bc I’m sure they use the same system but anyways didn’t wanna argue so I just order and do pickup and when I get there I had to wait at the counter for over 5 mins just for someone to speak to me. Then in the middle of her ringing me up she proceeds to leave the counter to give another customer their order for free I might add. So I’m furious at this point and I ask if the pizza comes with ranch and she says no and doesn’t ask if I need any or anything so I ask her to get me 2 cups of ranch and she acted like it was a problem I needed ranch. So overall the service and professionalism is horrible. 10/10 do NOT recommend

resp.text: Lyndsey  I am so sorry for your poor experience.  We MUST do better!  Please consider giving us another chance to earn your business.  -HOWARD I am so sorry for your poor experience.  We MUST do better!  Please consider giving us another chance to earn your business.  -HOWARD

name: Jami Brown
text: The most rudest ghettoes Hungry Howie’s ever. I called to report that when I opened my 8piece barbecue chicken wings I only had 7 in the box the manager was rude and said she’ll give me a $1 Credit which is fine but I didn’t get I’m sorry ma’am never will we order from this place again! #HungrayHowie’sTuscaloosa69South

resp.text: Jami  Uh-oh! 😕  SO sorry the service you received wasn't up to par! Please let me know all the details here: https://www.hungryhowies.com/contact-us-0 -HOWARD

text: I ordered the $15 deal with the two pizzas and bread and it was horrible! The bread was burned and way too hard and extremely salty, my pizzas were just awful. I think I'll stick to the one in Northport they never disappoint me.

resp.text: Dejeurnetta  I am so sorry for your poor experience.  We MUST do better!  Please consider giving us another chance to earn your business.  -HOWARD

text: I think these guy's are great! Fast delivery, great pizza and always very curtious.

name: James McDanal
text: I ordered 2 large pizza and a Pepsi and was charged 30$ for it I used to only pay 13$ So much for new and better ownership.

resp.text: Hi James! Sorry you felt the price was high. We currently have 2 medium Pizzas & a Pepsi for $15. We also have a Large 3 topping Pizza for 7.99. Please email me and I can help you out. HelpJames@howiewings.com

resp.text: Rissa  So close yet so far from the perfect 5 ⭐️... where did we fall short? -HOWARD So close yet so far from the perfect 5 ⭐️... where did we fall short? -HOWARD

text: I love a cheap pizza, and Hungry Howie's is my go to place for it. I don't recall ever having a messed up order or bad experience. It's always quick for for pick up.

From what I have heard, they also treat their employees like trash. I would rather support Dominoes. I think CiCi's is actually a step up.

resp.text: Jon  I am so sorry for your poor experience.  We MUST do better!  Please consider giving us another chance to earn your business.  -HOWARD

name: Mark Paul
text: Another great place to get a bite. Very fresh ingredients on the sandwich. That peach tea that people come to get JUST FOR THE TEA I must admit is outstanding.Mobile is blessed with many great restaurants.

name: Robert Smith
text: At first I was happy to find out that this company delivered to my job, order food got it early even left the driver a good tip, next day had a good amount of people from corporate that wanted lunch delivered to the job just to find out they don't deliver in this area!! Very disappointed. You guys are the only delivery service that goes to the restaurant my company likes. No one from the company have not responded to my calls on the reason why you guy's stop after one delivery. Major opportunity just went out the window.

name: Jessi Stubstad
text: They were great, however since the change over, they are rarely open.  I haven't been able to order from here in over a month.  Recommend Waityr.  They seem to cover the same places.

name: Shelby Anderson
text: Drivers are always friendly! Owner called once to tell me they would be late and personally apologized and offered a discount on my next order. Port city is reasonably priced compared to the other delivery services. We are very impressed with Port City Deliveries!

name: Stephanie “Momma Sasade” Sasade
text:
While visiting family I discovered this wonderful
Local company that is the only delivery service for my favorite, Pizzeria Delphina! Prices are fair and they pay their drivers the whole tip plus the delivery fee. Manager on phone was very quick to fix my order before he sent it and food came before the estimated time. I will gladly use this company again and my family has vowed to keep using them as well.

name: Michael Keahey
text: The deliverer called three times concerning the address. The first time I was told that there was no *****North, so I corrected them: *****West. The second time they called they told me that there was no *****South, so again I corrected them. The third time they called (and by this time they were already 30 minutes late) they had me walk outside so that they could more easily find the house, and that would have been fine had they been sure that they were in the right neighborhood. Eventually though, they found me and they gave me a $10 credit for the trouble. I will still only give 2 stars because of my cold order.

name: Leslie Hakanson
text: Friendly and helpful office.  Friendly drivers. Good option when need food but can't get out/away.

name: Will Hannon
text: They put an emphasis on delivering for local restaurants.

name: Kimberly Williams
text: Absolute worst service EVER!  Have been ordering for over a year.  Sometimes 2 -3 times a week. Had trouble with their website this morning.  Austin answered the phone.  Told, by Austin, sorry your are having trouble with the website but I have four other phone calls.  Go handle those phone calls Austin.  Cuz, I certainly will NEVER be calling y'all again.  If I could give you NEGATIVE stars I would.

name: Music4Meka
text: I've used for over a year now and they're great

name: Jenny Nall
text: After I placed an order I was notified that it would take over 3 hours!  No one would return my calls or email.  Very unprofessional, terrible business! If I could give Port City Deliveries no stars I would.

name: Brennan Baker
text: These guys delivered in less than 30 minutes! I just moved to Mobile from Tuscaloosa and have been looking for somewhere that delivers food from everywhere thank goodness for these guys!! Awesome service give it a go!

name: jennifer brown
text: We ordered from work. It took over 30 minutes to place the order, then they called back and said that they had to cancel the order because the restaurant closed.  But they still charged my credit card.  I tried to call them back today but I only got a voicemail. My friend who ordered also, had charges come out of her account 6 times.  Beware!! They will steal your money!!!

name: Lance Mayfield
text: Pretty faIr and fast service

name: Nicole McCall
text: Driver was very kind. And the food came quicker than I thought it would.

name: Marina Buie
text: Great experience! We ordered from a different delivery company the night before and it was awful. So very happy to find a company that believes in customer service!

name: mill W
text: Port City Deliveries is a life saver. So many days I work longer than expected and can't get away for a meal. So I hop on the app and find a local place to order from. If the delivery person is running late they call and give a heads up with an apology. I also get texts to let me know when they are close by. They are always pleasant & polite. Tonight I ordered from a Chinese restaurant & my food was all wrong. Wasn't sure if I should contact the restaurant or PCD (since they brought me the food & I couldn't leave work to return it myself). I decided to call pcd. Maaan, I'm so glad I did! *AJ* did not hesitate to solve the issue.  He stepped right up & got the problem solved. Went far and beyond to make it right. Now THAT'S how you handle business! Dwnld the app, it's a game changer for sure.

name: Craig Tucker
text: First delivery experience. Fast and friendly. Good food, too.

name: Tracee Wallace
text:
I placed a lunch order today fried shrimp poboy with waffle fries what I got was blacken shrimp with tater tots. I called Port city they blamed Montego restaurant  I call monetego they blamed port city but nobody offered to refund  port city offered to credit my account fo the next time I use the I fee like l am being forced to use them #disappoint
July 17,2018. Today I was surprised to receive a call from AJ  to follow up. He apologized and  let me know I would be receiving a refund and a credit. I value good customer service and the willingness to go the extra mile to improve upon short falls. I will definitely give Port City Delivers another opportunity to provide great service!!

name: Brooke Crane
text: Now I can order from all my favorite places!!

name: Star Winstead
text: Always awesome experience

name: Deidra Dees
text: How did I get blocked from ordering food

text: This is my second time using their services and the employees are great and really hard working and I think I’ll continue to in the future

name: Christian Young
text: Great customer service and friendly

name: Logan Brown
text: Waitr is unreliable and unhelpful. I HIGHLY recommend using Port City Deliveries!!!

name: Beth Lowe
text: was told this company went out of business ???/   yes / No ???

name: Becca Croley
text: Fast and friendly

name: Adam Robinson
text: Ok service.

name: Michael Taylor
text: The owner is someone who misleads people

name: Julie Overton
text: I made a large order and expected better food. One pizza was so dry it tasted like stale crackers. Two of my pizzas barely had sauce on them, and one pizza had NONE! The garlic parmesan wings were fine as plain wings because sauce was just barely drizzled on them. When I tried to speak to the shift manager about the issue, she was rude and treated me as though I was making it all up to receive free food. I did not ask for a refund. I just asked that it be made right. I drove 20 miles to order and pick up food from this location and I will not be going back. This is the worst experience I've ever had with a Domino's.

name: Rebeckah Faye
text: So last night we ordered, and things got a little mixed up and our order was a late. They were super busy, it was a Friday night,  phone steady ringing. Well the manager on duty ((i didn't catch his name)) lovely gentleman, went above and beyond to fix the mistake that was made. I was so mad when I went in and bless his heart he caught an earful, but when I say he handled it with ease and grace. Baby he did WONDERFUL. Kudos to you sir. I know this store has much growing to do but they are lucky to have a boss man like you!!

name: Brad Seal
text: The food is awesome!  Pizza is good but the wings are great, even better!  They're a real life save because it's literally the only place in town that delivers and like many others I'm working from home and can't find time to get much shopping done.  Thanks to Dominoes for coming and saving our town :D

name: Alisa Gill
text: I would give them zero stars if possible. 1st I tried placing an order that should have been $18.99 + tax. It came to $24.50 + tax. Finally got that corrected and when it said my order was ready they told me 5 more mins. Then after that I was told a delivery driver took my pizza. After agreeing to make another one I get a phone call stating that I have to take the one that the driver took. Nope!!

name: Desirea Jenkins
text: Love this place!!! As a food industry worker myself, I commend these folks on doing such a great job. Theyve blessed us at huddle house with free food. Anyone who does that is a winner in my eyes 😍

name: Big Country
text: This is the second time I've ordered delivery from here and my wife agrees that the service was excellent, the pizzas were exactly what we order and cooked perfectly, delivery drive was quick and followed the contact less delivery instructions to the tee. So keep up the good work guys, and don't let these other reviews get to you.

name: Luke Hostwaters
text: I was placing my order over the phone, as the girl goes to repeat my order back to me and tells me my total, she giggled. I got very frustrated because of the situation. I asked was something wrong and she said no im trying to find you a coupon so you don’t have to pay 50 dollars. This made me laugh after my long day of work, the little things people do or say make a difference, and most workers do not realize that. thanks kyla. i did not really catch the name so i tried my best. amazing food, my lava cakes were the best. i definitely plan on being back!

name: Courtney Brown
text: Easy ordering online and carside drop off makes it simple and easy.

name: Jason Evans
text: Would give 0 stars if I could. My order was wrong on this visit and the one before.  They did offer to fix it but driving 30 mins back to the store wasn't worth it.  Little Ceasar's is better never had an issue with them. Won't be back to Hamilton Alabama Dominos.

name: Benji Rider
text: Dude... Asked for the buffalo chicken bites and they sent plain chicken w a cup of buffalo sauce. They even called to confirm my order and was still incorrect. Then tried to charge me a second delivery charge to fix it, and told me to tip the driver again. When I got the correct chicken there was about a drop of buffalo sauce on each. Worst Dominos ever.

name: Lisa Walker
text: Well if I could have went lower i would have. It would have been nice to get a warm pizza, that wasn't hard a a brick

name: andrea loden
text: Seriously disappointed, myself the pizza is subpar to say the least and what they call csr Incompetent. Who does not understand what “ my order is wrong “ , means.? And then, their representative starts giggling while on the phone with you saying but I don’t understand “ what do mean it wasn’t right ? Please for the Love of god don’t release them if they’re not trained.... in phone etiquette and basic communication skills. It’s frustrating for people who are trusting you with their food.

name: Amber Luker
text: The food is great but the delivery person  was very rude

name: Donna Harris
text:
My 2 pizzas were overcooked and had hardly any cheese
I will think twice before ordering sgain

name: Ophie May
text: Dominos in Hamilton is a joke. I've been on the phone for half an hour just trying to get my pasta fixed, but ya know.. they don't answer.. I ordered a chicken alfredo and recieved this very dry pasta, the alfredo sauce is nonexistent.

name: Sabrina Brents
text: My order was 45 minutes late. I went thru the drive-thru and was told to make another lap since my pizza was in the oven.  I said how about I just pull over and park and someone brings it out.  The man at the window said ok. Keep in mind the car that was in front of us in the drive thru sat at the window for 15 minutes before we pulled up and we were told to make another lap. I waited another 20 minutes and finally just went in and got it. Also the car that was behind us was still at the window when i went in to get the pizza.. The food was ice cold.

name: Joe Shmitty
text: The food is good. The first few days were a little rocky with limited staff and high amounts of orders but after the first week I see an improvement in service.

name: Elijah Mayhorn
text: The food is great and service has drastically improved

name: Ken Murray
text: What a joke this Domino's is. Can't even get an order right and quality of service is slim to none.

name: sherry credille
text: I only gave it one star just so I can say this I was on the phone for over an hour to place an order no one answered the phone. My son tried for 45 minutes. What's up with this dominos

name: Laith Dawoud
text: I work here!! We love the city of Hamilton, and it’s a pleasure to be here!! DOMINOS PIZZA!!

name: Teela Holley
text: I work here and I love it great people

name: Kaden Blaine Whitaker
text: ye not the best but itll do

text: none of the food is ours and we paid 100 for it.

text: Great food and service

name: Donny Harden
text: Good food and good service

name: Robert Shelton
text: 14 dollar minimum order

name: Jeff Holloway
text: putrid.

name: Jamie Chambers
text: Waited 1.5 hours with no update on the tracking. Other experiences were fine during the day

resp.text: Jamie, we take pride in getting our customer orders within the hour and our order tracking ability for our customers. That said, we could not find your account on our system and we are trying to make things right for you.  Please email us at FetcherOps@fetchmedelivery.com so we can research and make things right for you.

name: ken evola
text: Favorite delivery service in Auburn!

name: Dominic Binkley
text: I ordered carryout from a local Italian restaurant through FetchMe and was told to pick up my meal at 4:15 p.m. But when I showed up, the restaurant told me they don’t open until 5:00, so I had to wait for them to make my food - totally defeating the point of ordering online. I would not recommend ordering through FetchMe.

resp.text:
Hey Dominic, we apologize for the inconvenience due to this. After looking into this matter further it appears that our restaurant partner had altered their ordering hours and did not make us aware. We have since fixed their changed hours so this should not happen in the future. As a locally owned business we value your feedback. Thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you ordering again from us.

Regards,

Harrison
Owner
FetchMe

name: Jonathan Williams
text: Great to have some local delivery guys in Auburn. My food was delivered quickly and safely. Couldn't recommend these guys enough!

resp.text: We live to serve our customers! Thanks you for the wonderful comments.

name: Kellyanne Brown
text: Came to visit Auburn and was told to try this App. Not only did they mess up several of my orders from some of the restaurants in the area (Burgerfi, five guys, and a few other places I had never tried before), I was also accused by their customer service of lying about my food not showing up! How about you take some responsibility? HOOORRRRIBLE business who doesn't care about their customers, I bet all of these positive reviews on here are from friends and not actual satisfied customers. Do not waste your time using this app, unless you are fine with your money disappearing and being accused of stealing.

resp.text: Hi Kellyanne, we looked at our customer files and we looked at our customer ratings and feedback.  We can not find the information on the above.  Please send us an email at support@fetchmedelivery.com with your information so we look at your orders and make it right.

name: Tori Brown
text: Cheaper and quicker than any other food delivery service in the area. Excellent customer service!!

name: Patti S.
text: FetchMe really helped in a pinch and we will always use FetchMe, from now on. Great quick, friendly and most importantly ... professional.

resp.text:
Thanks so much Patti! We love hearing such positive feedback. Yall are the reason we do the things we do. Please see us again soon!

-Harrison from FetchMe

name: Autumn Garrett
text: Do not work here

name: Tyler Wilson
text: Best delivery service in all of Auburn/Opelika. They are up to date with their COVID-19 practices, and I will be continuing to order from them from here on out.

name: FetcherOps HQ
text: FetchMe Delivery is a great LOCAL company that keeps their customers wants and desires at the heart! They always call to confirm if something happens at the restaurant and even provide me with extra things that I didn't even know I needed (sauces, wet wipes for my wings, etc) Truly a great company and should be the only delivery company you order from!!!  P.S. They also delivery groceries and can complete on-demand orders.

name: A Foster
text: Always quick, accurate, & courteous!

resp.text:
Thanks A for the feedback. Glad you enjoyed using us. Please see us again soon!

-Harrison

name: Megan Huff
text:
FetchMe Delivery....delivers ;).
I love this service and I can't express how simple it is AND how wide their territory is!! I live pretty far away from everything and I see FetchMe Delivery drivers all the time in my area, it's nice knowing that if I don't want to cook FetchMe Delivery has it covered!!

resp.text:
Thanks for your support Megan! We love reading reviews like this, you made our day! Let us know if you need anything.

Regards,

Harrison and the FetchMe Team

name: Nick Patrizio
text: I've been using food service delivery apps for awhile now (i.e. Uber eats, Grubhub) and then I visited Auburn U and came upon FetchME. I dont understand how this small time delivery business provided me much quicker and more enjoyable service than the larger players back home but it made my first experience at Auburn much more enjoyable. Quick, easy service. The next time I visit for a tailgate, I know who I'm reaching out to. And you probably should too.

name: Lacey Harbula
text: Food was excellent.  The service was wonderful. Server was chipper and very polite even though she'd been there all day. Definitely would like to go back.

resp.text: Thanks Lacey! We are a locally owned and operated company.   We love it when we make our customers day.

name: Patrick Kennedy
text: FetchMe Delivery is the go to delivery service when you want to get it done right.  I use them every time I am in town.   Thanks for the great service.

resp.text: Thank you Patrick--We love serving you and appreciate your feedback!

name: Matthew McMullen
text: Couldn't ask for a better delivery service to work with or for! Both as a patron and an employee, FetchMe has been nothing but top notch. Fast deliveries and a great side gig!

resp.text: Thanks Matt! We love that you are part of the team that strives to have excellent customer support by going above and beyond that was expected and by ensuring customers issue are quickly resolved.

name: Alice Evola
text: Used this service several times while in town. They were on time, meal was fresh, and the driver was courteous!

name: Alex Harris
text: Honestly what's not to love about FetchMe? Super fast delivery times, super great employees, my only regret is having to leave such a wonderful service behind when I moved out of Auburn. They truly make you feel like it's FetchME, not FetchEVERYBODYELSE.

resp.text: Thanks Alex!  FetchMe is striving to be the best online retailer that you have ever dealt. Our goal is to quickly follow up on your purchase and ensure you satisfied with your experience!

name: Jamila Mills
text: Great service, friendly delivery, but the charging process is a bit wonky. Accidentally tipped twice and felt bad correcting the tip. The final bill is usually different than what you think you spend upfront. So if they fix that, 5 stars.

resp.text: We appreciate the review, Jamila, hope you are doing well!

name: Patrick Lovell
text: FetchMe rocks! Quick delivery, very friendly drivers and staff, and they’re always helpful and easy to work with if there any any issues. Not to mention the wide range of food and grocery options they provide.

resp.text: Thanks Patrick. We strive to ensure everything is outstanding, from the website selection to the fetchers to the delivery experience.

name: Valerie Hawkins
text: They are quick and have reasonable delivery charges.

resp.text:
Thanks so much valerie, we love the feedback and are glad to hear we were able to take care of you! If you need anything please let us know!

-Harrison

name: Harrison
text: Excellent service and restaurant selection. Greeted by a friendly face and received our Groceries and dinner in no time at all!

name: Lane Minor
text: GREAT SERVICE!

name: Miracle Joy
text: Great  service  and fast

resp.text:
Thanks Miracle! Glad you enjoyed your experience. Love hearing this. If you need anything please give us a call!

-Harrison and the FetchMe Team

name: Christopher Talley
text: Best delivery service in Auburn hands down. Most restaurants and best service.

resp.text: Thanks Christopher.  We are fighting everything to ensure you have thousands of items to choose from and delivery is FAST.

name: Esther Lande
text: Always late. Dont order taco bell is always messing up the orders

resp.text: We would love to help you but we do not see an account for you.  Please connect with us.

name: Michael
text: Great service, app works smoothly, so many options and love that you can even order your groceries through this app. There may be delays sometimes but only on gameday weekends when they definitely are receiving tons of orders all at once and having to deal with loads of traffic. Would recommend for anybody in the auburn area to use.

name: AJ
text: I was shocked they delivered so far out to my home. I'm quite impressed! Plus the delivery fee was quite reasonable!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback! Its comments like yours that keep us going--Have a great night!!

name: Lakeisha Lark
text: Over charged my card

resp.text: Hi Lakeisha, we were able to find your order and wanted to ensure that you were aware that there was an authorization on your card for an amount greater than the price of the order. This is temporary and a pending transaction in case we have to make a substitution on your order. We are seeing only one charge and if you have any questions please feel free to contact us at 334-209-7730.

name: Damien Boren
text: Great company

resp.text:
Thanks for your business Damien. Please see us again soon and thanks for supporting local!

Harrison and The FetchMe Team

name: Scott McGlon
text: AUsome service, easy to use, and a lifesaver when my wife doesn't want to cook and I don't want to leave my chair!  We have ordered food delivery with FetchMeDelivery multiple times and they all went extremely well with each arriving earlier than expected.  We even asked them to make a delivery with a restaurant that was not set up in their system and they did it without a hitch.  Great service!

resp.text: Thank you Scott! We are working hard at delivering an AUsome experience for the community.   Appreciate your feedback!

name: harry harp
text: This service is terrible use tiger town to go they’re much less likely to completely butcher your order which they’ve messed up slightly or entirely every time I’ve ordered from them. Also when I called to tell them they butchered my order to the point I didn’t want to eat and they said they’d refund which they did but they refunded $8 for a $12 meal not including the $7 delivery charge and tax and the tip I gave the terrible delivery driver. Either go get your food yourself or order from any other delivery service because this is not worth it.

resp.text: Good morning Harry! Thank you very much for bringing this to our attention.  We acknowledge that sometimes mistakes do happen and am sorry you did not have a great experience.  Your experience is the most important thing to every employee at FetchMe.  We reached out to the restaurant who controls the food quality and have addressed quality control challenges with them given they prepare your food.  We have also reached out to you in order to ensure things have been made right with you.  Please engage our delivery center so we can resolve this to your satisfaction.

name: pink pink
text: Good service lots of choices in restaurants. Delivery fees are reasonable and they are quick 😊

resp.text: Thank you for your review!  We are working hard at creating a great experience for you. Have a great day!

name: C Kinder
text: Always on time and the drivers are super friendly! This is the only delivery service I use in the Auburn area.

name: frances coleman
text: They go above and beyond.

resp.text: Thanks Frances, after a long hard week of making deliveries, this really made our day! Thank you so much!

name: Joy Evans
text: I work for a school and ordered lunch from Moe's. I wrote in the instructions and comments to place Queso on the side. I got my order and no Queso on the side nor inside my nacho's. I called FetchMe and was greeted by a very friendly voice who assured me that my Queso would be delivered. My Queso was indeed delivered and the driver was very friendly and not at all bothered by bringing only Queso in. Both apologized and made this hungry, trapped at work, Queso loving girl VERY happy!!!!

resp.text:
Thanks Joy, We appreciate the support and feedback. Glad we could fix your Queso emergency :)
-Harrison and The FetchMe Team

name: K-way Cotton
text: Very nice people and fast service

resp.text: Thanks K-way, as a locally owned company we appreciate your support and love the feedback. Give us a call if you need anything!

name: Tank Wilkerson
text: When your down & sick plus tired of pizza these guys can get you what you need!!!! Nice & timely

resp.text: Thanks Tank! The FetchMe team is  actively working to expand the options for our customers.  Appreciate your feedback! Thanks again.

name: Amr Abdul-Gaffar
text: Its a good service, I dont know why theres only 1 review with no explanation. It saves alot of time. And i don’t have to get out of my house when its 100 degrees outside

resp.text:
Thanks Amri, your satisfaction means a lot to us! We love the feedback and your support.

-Harrison

name: Houston Harrod
text: Extremely nice and professional

resp.text: Thanks Houston!

name: Jae Morgan Reid
text: They close earlier than their website says

name: Melisa Williford
text: Had no sign on the building

resp.text: Hi Melisa! Thanks for your review. Was this meant for us or when you applied perhaps? We are a delivery company that conducts business virtually on our website so we dont have a store front, meaning there is no sign needed and no building.

name: Hannah McPhillips
text: I had the BEST experience using Tiger Town To Go!  It was user friendly, they were professional, and they were fast.  I will definitely be using them again and again and recommending them to everyone.  It's so convenient and 100% worth it.  Highly recommend for all your food delivery needs.

name: STACIA TWAROG
text: Frequent customer, I love how easy their app is to use, and my orders always arrive so much faster than they  estimated delivery time. I ordered Pho Lee tonight and it arrived quickly, hot, and delicious! The driver was very polite, and used proper safety measures. It’s also great to be able to support a local small business.

name: Afra Williams
text: I learned of TTTG when I moved back to Auburn. I like to go places normally for food... Or anything else for that matter; but its been pretty much a life saver since I have a small child. And I would much rather support local businesses. Which I believe TTTG is. My orders are always timely and still hot. This is a great company.

name: John Martin
text: Tigertowntogo is the original and in my opinion, best, food delivery service in this area. Their website is user friendly and offers plenty of options from local restaurants. On the rare occasion that an order is incorrect, they always try to make it right with a professional attitude.

name: Lauree Riggin
text: Delivered soup to our sick daughter and son-in-law. Perfect

name: Brandt LaPish
text: Best delivery hands down! The drivers are always so kind and prompt! I literally couldn't ask for better service. Thank you TigerTown!!

name: Allison Palmer
text: I have been conducting regular (frequently, daily) business with TTTG for approximately 2 years, especially since the pandemic set in. While major errors with my orders have been infrequent, I've let go of minor errors which occur fairly often.  Today, however, I've made the choice to NO longer conduct business with them. I ordered from an establishment which serves smoothies, as well as food items. Not only DIDN'T my smoothie arrive, but NO ONE -- not from Tropical Smoothie Cafe, to the driver of TTTG, to those working in the TTTG office -- contact me. They all just took my $ (to inc extra tip for driver) without the courtesy of informing me to make another choice. I'm sure my bill will be adjusted (or that will be a fraudulent charge), but I'm NEVER engaging in business with TTTG again. Thankfully, as a consumer, I have other choices.

name: Madeline Gall
text: Tigertowntogo is great! Ordered a nice dinner and got it in a very timely manner, even faster than the website originally said!

name: Blake Graham
text: Never been here 0/10

name: Chelsea McCard
text: I always get my order pretty timely. Sometimes some things get messed up or cutlery is missing but this IS NOT the drivers fault. It is the RESTAURANTS. And honestly, these things happen. I have never has a rude driver or an issue with anyone that actually works for the delivery service

name: K B
text: No plasticware was included in my order.  The delivery address (Marriott) should be the give away that I dont have a fork here.  This was way overpriced for a screw up.

name: Yologsolive Kennedy
text: I like going here for a quick bite to eat when I’m not cooking. It sometimes seems like they are cutting back on ingredients.Sometimes the pizza look great but what can you ask for for $5 and I still like it here.

name: Justice For All
text: You can't beat a pepperoni pizza for $5 it's always very good hot and fresh. Pizza Pizza

name: N. Hope
text: My husband and I have ordered from here via the app at least 3 times over the past year. The employees have always been nice and the store has been clean. We have always gotten exactly what we ordered and it was always warm. Using the app allows us to avoid any wait time as well, so I would recommend using it if you are not willing to wait.

name: doc lamb

text: The Little Caesars in Columbiana is a solid franchise. They always deliver what you expect and the service is good.

I don't mind a small crust but that was ridiculous. I will go back but hopefully this will not happen again

Call and they don’t answer or they answer and hang up in your face. Go to the lil Caesars in Calera. They are awesome.

Worse place ever!

I just wanted a quick meal to feed my family. After much debate she finally found a code. I got my horribly cold pizza and no sauce that i ordered. So. I will from now on drive on into Camera. Will not ever go back to this location. The red head lady working needs customer service skills and retraining.

name: Mellissa Harris
text: The system was down online so I had to call the store. No one answered and I called four times. When I arrived at the store their were at least 6 employees there.  I informed thetge worker and she didn't seem to care. This dominos location on gateway has really gone down and the only reason I went was for my uncle. Service is poor and they usually get my order wrong that's why I've stopped eating at this location. They really need a better manager. And an employee also drop a customers sauces while delivering curbside and didn't pick them up. Just very unprofessional location and very lazy.

name: Michael Rizzuto
text: Got a phone call minutes after placing my order to inform me that their hours had changed and they no longer delivered to the address for the hotel I was staying at. They need to updated their website to reflect this. I understand they are low staffed but she said until the end of summer the hours had changed. Need to fix that so other travelers aren’t wasting their time.

name: Drew Hill
text: Overall good. I would suggest sticking with the hand tossed pizzas. Tried the pan and got the extravaganza, basically the supreme with everything and it turned out really doughy like it needed a few more minutes in the oven. This is typical when there's that many toppings, but was still a bit disappointed. Ended up finishing it myself in the oven at home.

text: I did not get garlic butter on my bread knots!

name: Jessica Driggers
text:
First off, the female who answered the phone hung up on me when i asked her to hold on.  I understand not being able to hold,  but all she had to do was say that and not hang up on me.....because when i called back she then had me hold.

Then when i got to the store they couldn't break a $100 bill...when my bill was $40, so they claimed they didn't have $60 worth if change in the drawer..... frightfully inconvenient....and the female at the counter told me to 'just go to the gas station and get change'.....so much for customer service....

We WILL NOT be going back to this location.... there are much nicer, friendlier, more customer-centric locations with the same area.

AND, don't order cheese bread and expect any sauce, THE MANAGER said that 'every franchise does it differently'....I guess I misunderstood the concept of a franchise.

text: I asked what they had for special i was told larg specialty for 14.99 told the guy that i wanted that then said i wanted a med pepperoni. When it was delivered i got hust the med pepperoni. When i called back the guy who i placed my order with when i told him that i was to have 2 pizzas one was a larg specialty an med pepperoni he said i didnt specify what specialty i wanted i thought a specialty was with everthing one it futher more he didnt even bother to even ask me what specialty i wanted. I guess nectime inorder i guess ill go to all the way to auburn to pizza hut cause when you ask for specialty they give you all the way on it unless younask for meat lovers or a supreme pizza. I guess thats what i get for not realy asking down to the details what their specialty means. Your people who answers phone needs to learn how to place an ask your guest what they want on pizzas cause they just cost you money. Cause i dont like to go all the way to auburn to get pizza when i can have it delivered but not any more for a person who dont like the auburn trafic guess i will have to fight it next time for a pizza. Thank you for your hospitality an for not trying to make things right with you customer.

name: Catherine Wilson
text: Please an order before closing my order was canceled because they didn’t feel like fixing/delivering the order called next day manager was very rude stated he wasn’t there add they had there reasons I thought that was so unprofessional

name: elizabeth konegan
text: I have had them deliver to my house for the last 9 years and all of a sudden they don't deliver out here . You will not get any of my business anymore .

name: Jessie Hodges
text: My daughter came and picked up a pepperoni pizza and cinnionmon twist.. I am very displeased with both.. They were burnt and very tough to eat.. I don't think I will be coming back...

name: Jessie Hodges
text: My daughter came and picked up a pepperoni pizza and cinnionmon twist.. I am very displeased with both.. They were burnt and very tough to eat.. I don't think I will be coming back...

name: Kristina Wilkes
text: If I could give zero stars I would. This place is run poorly. They are always understaffed. I placed an order for delivery and they called me 15 minutes later (when the delivery quote was 22 minutes) to inform me that they could not deliver my pizza but I could come pick it up for the SAME PRICE even though the delivery fee is 3.99 and I tipped the driver 20%. The manager was useless. I don’t even blame the staff there, seems like it stems from corporate. Absolutely awful.

name: Staci Cannon
text: My pizza was burnt and it was a hot mess. I wont never spend a dime with them

name: Muffinman Wolfe
text: Dude, this dominos was operating with one manager and one delivery guy on a Thursday night! Constant phone calls, rushing back and forth, the delivery guy helping make pizzas and taking four to five deliveries out while we were there, I mean these two guy were killing it! Absolute badasses and deserve some praise!

name: Tammy Stafford-Bellflower
text: Ordered, through the app, a large Brooklyn MeatZZa pizza a few minutes past 5: pm, and the alert came up a few minutes later saying it was ready. I live 40 minutes away, and I get home, open up the box, and no meat; just plain cheese pizza. I called and was told they would do another one...and plus one, for free, and that it would be ready by the time I arrive. I go in to pick up and both orders are wrong, again. I had to wait 15 minutes for them to redo the orders. It ended up being 2 1/2 hours before me and my family finally got to eat.

name: Kesia Drake
text: Been on hold for a hour every time I call😡😡😡
