text: Their "Everything" pizza is magical. I can eat half a pizza and the next day discover I've lost half a pound. Great tasting and weight loss for the win!

resp.text: Lol! We wouldn’t advise this as a long term diet but we love the review!

name: Nancy Owen
text: Really great muffuletta.

resp.text: My personal favorite!

name: Paige Sweeney
text: We have had this twice. The pizza is amazing! I will say, be prepared for the real deal. Depending on what size pizza you get- get more. Not saying they don’t provide enough- I just realized this isn’t your chain pizza company. It’s the real thing. So now we order two large pizzas for a family of 4- yes leftovers are also awesome! What I want to see is spaghetti on the menu! I have the best recipe and then throw your meatballs in :)

resp.text: Thank you

name: Bryan Singer
text: Pizza is stupid good! Love their red sauce, and they have green olives :) most have only black olives

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Tim Hart
text: The pizza here is great, but this is the home of the best meatballs sandwich ever.

name: Becca H
text: Recently started ordering from this restaurant in Helena and so far, we’ve been impressed. The pizza is far better than most of the other chains that are around. Delivery is fast too, it gave us a much longer delivery time frame and almost didn’t order but took the chance and still had it in half the time and that is for both times I’ve ordered so far. I’ve told everyone at work how great it is, glad we tried this place.

resp.text: Thank you and we try to improve delivery information.

name: Brian Miller
text: Nice local place, good food. We like the thin crust pizza. Much better than chain restaurants.

resp.text: Thanks Brian! We’re glad you keep it local!

name: Richie & Amber
text: Good food. All employees are polite except one specific kid. Didnt catch his name slender and wears glasses. Picked up my food and had an attitude.  Not a customer oriented young kid. I will go back but if I deal with it again I won't be back! Also had an attitude over the phone also.

name: Phil R
text: This place has some really tasty pizza! I almost took off a star for them sending me the wrong pizza recently, but honestly, what they sent was probably better than what I ordered! :) Their online ordering system is circa 2007ish and doesn’t always work, but hopefully they’ll upgrade soon. Regardless, I’ll definitely keep ordering food from these guys.

name: Madhav Devani
text: My family and I love this place. Super delicious pizzas. I love their calzones. Very clean facility too.

resp.text: Thank you so much Madhav!

name: Keila Morse
text: We order a couple of times a month and are never disappointed.   Great pizzas and calzones but their muffalettas are the best this side of New Orleans.  Delicious.  My husband likes their wings.

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate your kind words!

name: Toby TenHarmsel
text: Great local pizza.

name: Glenda Pittman
text: Friendly staff and great pizza

name: Nick Sherman
text: Amazing pizza. Very impressive! Will definitely order again

name: Kelsey
text: I love this place does pasta well. It's pizza restaurant fast pasta but not bad. They also do calzones so thats a bonus. The bad part is not all ingredients are fresh. Forgo the mushrooms and olives. The taste like the came from a can for sure! The cheese bread is also good. The not so healthy options are cheesy and delicious! The staff tend to be young adults or local students so don't expect chick fil a level service but they are kind. Enjoy!

name: Alexander Yeatman
text: Rather tasty food and fast service. They also have very friendly workers.

name: Chris McMahon
text: Wings were not as done as they should have been. Had to crisp them in the toaster oven when I got them home. Pizza was ok.

name: Guilaine Firth
text: First time customers here, the first time we ordered was the other night. We were desperately looking for another amazing little pizza place(no Marcos, Papa Johns) & happened to come across this one & so happy we did. Pizza was GREAT, staff was friendly & service was fast! We just had to do this again after a super long exhausting day.. Thank you :)

resp.text: Thank you. Please visit again.

name: Jimmy Chambliss
text: Service was great, pizza was ready very fast and was very good.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Calvert Hose
text: Great Pizza, decent price for quality, just wished they had a superlite sauce option online...less sauce is still too much for one persons preference, but if you call they can do it just the way you like.

name: Darren Wells
text: It’s National Pizza Day!!  We wanted something different than the chain stores, so we ordered All Original. Best choice of pizza around. The pizza is phenomenal and my wife said the muffuletta was to die for. No more chain pizza for us.

name: jessica callison
text: My favorite local pizza place! Everything is delicious! Apple turnover is my favorite thing to order!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Dawn Begun
text: Ordered take out from here. It was outstanding! We got Stromboli’s and calzones. This restaurant really knows Italian food.

resp.text: 😎 Thank you!

name: Brittany Case
text: Delicious meatball calzone! Best pizza place in Shelby County.

name: Jacques Thompson
text: Some of the best thin pizza around. They will prepare your food to liking when requested. Always quick and courteous.

name: Amanda Nutton
text: Amazing Calzones.  Fresh and delicious.  The staff is very nice.

resp.text: 🙏thank you so much!

name: Breana Thomas
text: Good pizza and wings, good prices

name: Jamie Rogers
text: Convenient location, and the staff is awesome! They will listen to you and make your food perfect every time. The food always taste wonderful! Highly recommend going here!!!

name: michael crowley
text: Their Philly cheese steaks? No no no. Can't get fried onions and fried green peppers? Don't even call it a Philly cheese steak. These are staples of a good steak sandwich. I grew up in Philly. Save your money and go to Charlie's Cheese Steaks in the Galeria in Hoover. Best sandwich I've had outside of Philly. Jersey Mike's is great too. Both are worth the drive.

name: Alexandria Lewis
text: Best pizza I have ever had in Alabama

resp.text: Well that is quite the review! Thank you sooo much!

name: Patricia Papalardo
text: We love All Original! The supreme calzone is the best!

resp.text: We’re fond of it as well!

name: Jeremiah Mcdaniel
text: The level of service and the care are not up to par. The customers keep you operational and pleasing them should be first.

name: sean thomas
text: This place has awesome, unique pizza. They also have great calzones. I go there quite a bit. It's sad that the Friday crew know me by name.

name: Phillip Waters
text: The muffalettas are out of this world!

name: Catherine Scurlock
text: Very good food and great customer service food was hot and ready to go when I got there no wait time

resp.text: Thank you so much! We’re very happy you enjoyed it!

name: Courtney Bates
text: Got two large calzones, one supreme and one meat lovers. This was more than enough food for 5 people and cost $35. I'm currently eating 3 day old left overs and still amazing. I don't care about the price this is the best calzone I've ever had.

name: Joey Topazi
text: Consistently good. By far the best pizza in helena.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback.

name: Scott Freeman
text: Said would be around an hour to deliver. Did not say pizza would be cold, 25 minutes late, and when i called and asked, got he will be there in 5 minutes. Not sorry, not anything. I have ate at the mccalla location since it opened and not sure if i will order from here again. This is the 3rd time, this has happened.

resp.text: Let me check back on this and come back to you. Please allow me. Thank you.

name: Chris Collins
text: Best chef salad I've had!  Meatball hoagie and thin crust pizza pretty good too.  Not missing hungry Howie's at all.

name: Lauren Jefferson
text: We had no idea what we wanted when we called and the guy on the phone was super helpful and kind. We got 2 calzones and a pizza and everything was really good! Both calzones were amazing and packed full. The guy hung up thanking us for the business and I thought that was really kind.

name: Bambi Houston
text: You will love this place . I'm Italian and this is as close as you can get to authentic.  I have not found anything on the menu I don't like.  Value to omg you will get 2 meals out of all their meals.  My fav so far is a toss up between the lasagna and the hoagies.  Everything is made to order the bread is so soft and you can add things to your lasagna spaghetti or anything.  The apple turnover is made fresh too you can add extra filling or cinnamon,  icing etc. Everyone is so nice too and their website is very user friendly.  If I could give them 10 stars I would.

name: Henry Brito
text: The pizza was really good. Fresh and hot.

resp.text: Thank you Henry!

name: Colby Willoughby
text: Bought a large meat lovers, costed $20 just for the toppings to slide off of the slices, the cheese looked like it was just melted shredded mozzarella cheese, and a very small pizza. Disappointed to say the least

resp.text: Sorry to hear that. Let us know if we can bring our image with you. Give us a chance.

name: W Price
text: Best non-chain pizza option for the Helena area.  Just as good as the original location in McCalla.  Double Cheez-Double Pepp is our go to.  Always great pizza; always fast service (25 min wait even during a Bama game).

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Lee Pate
text: Meat Calzone was tasty. Thanks.

name: Kevin Stober
text: The smell is great when you open the door !

name: ryan greer
text: Great pizza! I come here just about every other week!

name: David Runnels
text: I'm always a walk-in. Pizza is done in 10 minutes or less, and is always delicious! You might get a pizza for cheaper, but not of this quality; and it not really too bad of a price anyway.

name: Ashley Shearer
text: Always delicious!!!

name: Russ Richardson
text: Best pizza hands down!

name: Jeffrey White
text: Great Food!!

name: Leanne Dillard
text: Good pizza and subs

name: Wendy Mitchell
text: expensive but good

name: Cassandra White
text: Wonderful everything!!

name: deamber dixon
text: They are NEVER on time. EVER

name: Scott Brazelton
text: Got the Brooklyn style crust. The pizza was literally see through lol. The steak sandwich was decent though

name: Paul Buhrmester
text: We were so very amazed and impressed by Mama Lottie's Pizza!! While googling places to eat while in Gulf Shores, we settled on pizza. This place had good reviews, so we drove on over. Our group of eleven dined in, even though it was a little bit warm inside. There service was great! The food looked, smelled, and tasted amazing! Handmade dough, and fresh start to finish. And you could tell by the traffic, that this pizza place is enjoyed by many locals. We'll make sure to come back whenever we're in town 😊

name: Airbrush Ink
text: Well I honestly don’t know how the food tastes.   The service however, isn’t the friendliest Ive experienced for sure.   Went by about two weeks ago around 2 o’clock walked in, and was immediately told they don’t open till 3 o’clock!    No other words were spoken as the woman returned to the back of the restaurant.   Even though the door has a pretty large sign that says open daily at 11am.   But ok no worries, come back around 3:30 today to get a couple of slices of pizza because heck it says pizza by the slice on the window as well.   But was told NOPE we only do pizza by the slice till 3.    Again nothing else was said.   But wait y’all open at 3 right!?    No suggestions on maybe a small pizza place r anything like that.   Hey no worries, I’ll take my hard earned money else where.   Best of luck.

name: Jennifer Ewan
text: We ordered 7 pizzas for delivery. The girl on the phone was SUPER nice & let me know it would be an hour & a half. We expected a long wait due to how busy every place in town had been, so that was no big deal. Pizza was delivered a bit early & was absolutely delicious. The delivery lady was also very nice. We'll definitely be repeat customers!

name: Sarah Moss
text: Amazing pizza!  Kind and helpful staff.

resp.text: Sarah, thank you for swinging by! Hope you come back our way. -Devin, Manager

name: Haplo One
text: Best meal we had while in GF!  The first as well.  Within walking distance of the condo, and the staff was very friendly.  They were very busy but the pie was ready quickly and was pretty damn good.  Highly recommend.

resp.text: Haplo, thanks so much for taking a quick walk to come see us. We're happy to have extended a warm welcome to Gulf Shores with a delicious slice. Hope to see you back many more times! -Devin, Manager

name: Mark Masavage
text:
Great pizza and better service.

We arrived to the area late Saturday and ordered pizza from papa John's. They told us it would be ready in 20 mins, but when we went to pick it up, they told us 2hrs. I cancelled the order, and when driving back to the condo, I spotted Mama Lottie's. I stopped in, in hopes they were still taking orders. Unfortunately, they stopped taking orders 2hrs before, but were still making carry outs!

Even though I did not leave with a pizza, I left with a smile, because of the great attitude of the people working.

Because of this experience, we ordered  Mama Lottie's on Thursday. They said it would be ready in 30min. It was, and the service was just as friendly. The pizza was very good, as well.

resp.text: Mark, we're so glad we were able to turn your pizza experience around! Thanks for spotting us and giving us a shot to impress you. The next time you're in the area, we'll have a pizza pie with your name on it! -Devin, Manager

name: jason allman
text: Food is amazing. Prices are very reasonable. People that work there are very friendly. I highly recommend them.

name: Jon Moor
text: Not a bad pizza. Fresh ingredients always a plus+!

resp.text: Jon, it's great you could visit us! We'd love to have you back our way soon. -Devin, Manager

name: Josh Lea
text: We are locals and this is our pizza spot. Every time we have family visiting we order Momma Lottis and they are blown away! Eat here! You won’t be disappointed

resp.text: Josh, we're honored to have you as one of our regulars. It's always a pleasure to serve you. See you back the next time you're craving a slice. -Devin, Manager

name: Jon Moor
text: Not a bad pizza. Fresh ingredients always a plus+!

resp.text: Jon, it's great you could visit us! We'd love to have you back our way soon. -Devin, Manager

name: David Rodriquez
text: Just average, average price ($22.00  18" supreme), ample cheese, skimpy on toppings but everything was fresh. All in all, I would try somewhere else.

resp.text: David, we're sorry to hear that we didn't blow you away with flavor. We would have loved to have been told so we could have offered you up something else you might have liked better. Next time, we'd certainly love to make a suggestion. Hope to see you again. -Devin, Manager

name: Diana Olkowski
text: Great pizza and fast delivery! Top notch service. We enjoyed it!

resp.text: Diana, nothing beats getting a hot slice of ooey gooey pizza right to your door. Thanks for ordering from us -- see you again soon! -Devin, Manager

name: Joe Johnson
text: Good pizza.  Great price.... especially for the area

resp.text: Joe, happy to hear you can always count on us for a slice done right. You're always welcome back whenever you're close by. See you soon! -Devin, Manager

name: clayton nicholson
text: Great pizza! Even when they are covered up on a Friday night they don't skip on quality.

resp.text: Clayton, nothing better than to end your week with a delicious slice. Thanks for braving the crowd to grab some with us. Hope to see you back for some more the next time the craving strikes! See you soon. -Devin, Manager

name: Josh Keers
text: Love the customer service., and is must if you are in Gulfshores AL.

resp.text: Josh, thanks for always making us a stop whenever you're in town. It's a joy to serve you. Hope to see you back for another slice soon! -Devin, Manager

name: Gary Eaves
text: A lot of places claim to have “New York Style” Pizza.....Then you end up with something not even close! Well we just tried this place for the first time, and they aren't kidding! Delicious thin crust, great quality toppings and lots of them....We had the Meat lovers with extra cheese and it was truly on point....I normally eat three slices of pizza, but I maxed out with two of theirs....Absolutely the best pizza Ive had in Gulf Shores! Mama’s just became our “Go to” Pizza house! And the young lady that delivered our Pizza was outstanding!

resp.text: Gary, we're glad we held up our end of the deal when it comes to authentic 'New York Style' pizza. Meat lovers certainly is a crowd pleaser when it's done right -- adding extra cheese on top was the right move! Can't wait to see you back again and again for another pizza pie. -Devin, Manager

name: Maureen Doubleday
text: We had gluten free cauliflower crust pizza and it was amazing. The staff was very friendly and fun, service was fast. We had our pizza in 10 minutes. This will most definitely be our go to pizza place.

resp.text: Maureen, no matter how you eat, you should be able to enjoy delicious pizza! Thanks for checking us and our cauliflower crust out -- so glad you loved it! Can't wait to see you back again soon. -Devin, Manager

name: Mud Zombie
text:
SUCH GOOD PIZZA!

We are on vacation and looking for a place that would deliver out to the end of Fort Morgan. Every pizza place told me no but Mama Lotties actually offered to drive it to the Chevron and meet me.
Beyond that, the pizza is incredible! Such delicious crust, plenty of cheese and a very good sauce! We got the pepperoni and cheese and the cheese lovers. The pepperoni and cheese is one of the best I have ever had before and the cheese lovers was like nothing I’ve ever had on a pizza before. If you love feta and ricotta cheese it’s a must try for sure!
If you’re in the Gulf Shores area you MUST try Mama Lotties!

name: Keila Quiles
text: Ok pizza not a lot of flavor. Wouldn't eat it again. Chicago pizza is the best.

resp.text: Keila, we're sorry to hear our style pizza wasn't for you. We understand that there are so many different kinds and we may not be for everyone. We appreciate you checking us out though! -Devin, Manager

name: Kait Levin
text: Great fresh pizza! We got the Margherita with pepperoni and the crust was nice and crunchy and the herbs were fresh.

resp.text: Kait, delicious choice -- happy to hear you loved it! We only use the best ingredients. Looking forward to serving you up another pizza pie soon! -Devin, Manager

name: Denise L
text: Mama lotties house special pizza is amazing! Will definitely be my go to pizza from now on!!

resp.text: Denise, we're honored to snag that number one spot in your heart. It's a pleasure to serve you up a delicious pizza pie. See you back soon enough! -Devin, Manager

name: gmoneysbaby
text: The pizza is amazing. Eat at the Gulf Shores location every monday for lunch! For $5.99+tax you get 2 giant slices and a drink. Love the staff that's in there. DeeDee is the sweetest ever and makes some the best sweet tea! Love these guys 😍.

resp.text: What an amazing tradition to kick your week off right! We're always so happy to see you walk through our doors. See you this upcoming Monday for your slices! -Devin, Manager

name: Phil Morgan
text: My goto pizza. And they have gluten-free pizza.

resp.text: Thanks so much for joining us, Phil! Hoping to see you here in the future. -Devin, Manager

name: Aaron Liebo
text: All three employees were without masks, regardless of the state requirement. Very frustrating and disappointing. Go to Mellow Mushroom instead.

name: Viola Harvey
text: For ten years I've held the opinion that Zachary's is better than Little Star but tonight I'm not so sure. The classic deep dish was fantastic. AND the chicken wings are the best I can remember eating. Bonus.

name: John Haynes
text: Took a long time (2.5 hrs), but person taking the order was upfront and warned me it would take that long. To be fair, order was on a Sat night (move in day) in a beach town. They called me when pies were coming out of the oven. Had a twenty minute drive back to where we were staying, so wasn’t hot when we got there. Not their fault, and I imagine I could’ve gone 4.5 stars if I had been eating it right out of the oven. Prices were reasonable.

name: debby mcnicol
text: The pizza was great, the people were so friendly.  I will be back

resp.text: Debby, nothing beats a slice done right. Thanks for putting your faith in us and letting us deliver. Can't wait to welcome you back in for another pizza pie soon! -Devin, Manager

name: Steven Edwards
text: The pizza place we frequented while vacationing in Gulf Shores closed down so we've been looking for a new one. I think we've found it in Mama Lottie's. Excellent pizza, fresh and light, not greasy or heavy. Also ordered a large Cesar salad which was very good.

name: Hannah Lamborghini
text: The cheese sticks were AMAZING! The staff was very kind as well. 10/10 Recommend coming back again. The wait is like 14 minutes for a pizza but it’s so good.

name: Stephen Wardle
text: Solid pizza. The toppings are good and pizza tasted freshly made. The crust is a little weak to me. Rest was great.

name: Dennis Morgan
text: Surprisingly very good pizza.  It passed the crust flop test and the zaaaaa was delicious.  Better than a lot of pizzas in Chicago.

name: Cheryl Daves
text: Ordered the Long Island. It was tasty however it needed cheese on it. There just wasn't enough. We ordered an 18 in and it barely fed 3 people because it was so light. I'm from NY and I know pizza. I'd say this place is ok for a snack. Wasn't crazy about the dough. The fresh garlic is what made it ok.

name: Pete Belanger
text: Great pan style pizza.

resp.text: Appreciate you stopping by, Pete! Hope you make it back our way. -Devin, Manager

name: Mary Watkins
text: Great Service and great pizza and cheese sticks.  We were only in the city for 1 night.  So worth the wait (very busy night).  The called me when our order was done sooner than quoted.  Highly recommend!!

name: Jordon Hargrove
text:
Was able to order delivery to. Local campground so that was cool.  They were polite on the phone, and they showed up in like 25 minutes.

The pizza, meat lovers, was above average.  The calzone was amazing.

The wife and daughter had the manicotti and it was good, but cooler cold when it arrived.  We were able to warm it up in the microwave so not the end of the world.

Bread sticks where too dry and fluffy for our tastes, but that could just be us.

Would order pizza from them again.

name: Keith Williams
text: Great food and very friendly staff. Highly recommend for anyone who enjoys quality pizza at an affordable price. Wish there was a place this good where I live.

name: Ali Bacon
text: Delicious pizza, hot and tasty. Will definitely be back.

resp.text: Ali, nothing quite beats a great slice of pizza! So glad you love ours. Hope to see you back in soon! -Devin, Manager

name: Whitney Thrasher
text:
1. Great staff ! Very friendly, quick , and refills drinks quickly
2. Great prices !
3. The pizza is AMAZING !!!! We got a simple cheese pizza and it was AMAZING :)

DEFINITELY will be back the next time we're in gulf shores!!!!

name: Sue Maysonet
text: Excellent service, the pizza had great taste!

name: Lyndsey Howard
text: Delivery.com canceled our order after waiting almost 2 hours. We called Mama Lotties directly and got our pizza within 20 minutes. (We had to go pick it up, but that was fine.) Super friendly and much cheaper than ordering thru delivery.com. Pizza and cheese sticks were awesome.

name: Dustin Sayre
text: Great pizza excellent staff! They are always nice and friendly. The pizza is very tasty and not too stiff and not to soft just right. I eat here at least once a week and several of my employees do as well.

name: Alex Resendez
text: Pizza was on point and my wife's calzone was definitely to her liking. Staff was very nice and attentive also observed covid 19 protocols. Will definitely be going back for a pizza again.

name: Joan Pruden
text: Pizza is SO GOOD!! The wait is a bit long because they make pizzas fresh but the wait is worth it!!

name: Ashley Bullard
text: Me and my family walked in at 9:30pm and was told we could only order to go. There website & front door clearly states open until 11:00pm. Poor customer service and lacking in respect for families who are on vacation trying to have a good dining in experience.

name: Crystal Purvis
text: We eat here every trip we make to the beach and we've never been disappointed.

name: Shaneil Yarbrough
text: The staff were friendly and attentive. We started with breadsticks for the table and then enjoyed veggie, meatlovers, supreme, and philly steak individually. The food was good and served hot! We would definitely return.

name: Chris Denio
text: Friendly service and good pizza  !

resp.text: Chris, thanks for your review! We hope you'll be back again soon. -Devin, Manager

name: Dave Wilson
text: Pizza was very good. A little pricy and under the advertised size which makes it really pricy. That being said the crust is very good, the sauce is very good and the toppings were quality. The service was good and friendly. I would rank it the 2nd best pizza in the area only behind Vitolli's Pizza in Robertsdale.

name: Dustin Scarborough
text: We were referred by friends and we now call for take out at least once a week! If you want a quality pizza and a nice fresh salad this is your place!

name: Cam Sweat
text: Great food! Great prices for the amount of food and WONDERFUL staff! definitely recommend

name: Brandon Styles Live
text: Great place for pizza by the slice!

resp.text: It's great you enjoyed stopping by, Brandon! See you next time. -Devin, Manager

name: angie parr
text: The pizza was delicious!!!

name: Jennifer Lechleitner
text: Super friendly staff. I had the gluten free pizza and it was delicious. The guy who works there told me it’s a cauliflower crust (doesn’t taste like it but it’s delicious so I don’t really care what it is). No complaints.

name: George Ruper
text: Delicious pizza and cheese bread sticks. The young gentleman that waited on us was the best! We will definitely come here again next year.

name: Stephen Jenkins
text: Great pizza kids loved it.  Gluten free crust was delicious.

name: Kelli Johnson
text: Best cheese sticks I've ever had. They we're very thin and not all doughy and had lots of cheese and the garlic butter on them was so good too!! Pizza crust was thin and sauce was light and had a great flavor. Owner and staff very nice. We will be back for sure!

name: Anthony Lochrico
text: Cricos Pizza is way better

resp.text: Anthony, we're sorry to hear you weren't a fan of us. We understand that food is subjective and that our menu won't knock it out of the park for every single person. We're happy you've found a place you love! If you're ever back with us, ask for a suggestion -- we'd love to serve you something delicious! -Devin, Manager

name: David Lloyd
text: I love the lunch special. A pizza is always hot and fresh. The staff is friendly.It is in a convenient location to my work into my home. I recommend eating at this restaurant.

name: Lela Pollan
text: We ordered 14 pizzas for my son's wedding rehearsal dinner on 04/12/19.Devin the manager and his team were awesome. They delivered the pizza on time and was labeled as we requested. Everyone loved the pizza, there was none left over. I would highly recommend for your next event. Devin and his team were very friendly and the best customer service I've experienced in a while. Can't wait to go back to Mama Lotties for the best pizza in the South. Thanks guys for making our rehearsal dinner a huge success!!!

name: Jackson Chism
text: We were visiting Gulf Shores and were wanting something other than a chain pizza place. Pizza was incredible! Huge, New York style slices! Expect a little bit longer of a wait than your chain places, but it is absolutely worth it!

name: JulzDave Shute
text: Absolutely the best Italian (Pizza plus all the rest) Place here at the beach .. the secret is in the sauce and it will melt in your mouth! They also offer several Gluten-Free Pizza options and they taste just as good! A little pricier but you will not regret it. I used to live in Italy and this is the closest place I've ever had for true Italian food.

name: Nancy Litch
text: Very good pizza

resp.text: We're so glad you joined us, Nancy! We hope we'll see you here in the future. -Devin, Manager

name: Special Touch Restoration
text: Best pizza in town....

resp.text: Thanks so much for this excellent review! We hope you'll be coming back soon. -Devin, Manager

name: Jamie Dugger
text: Amazing! Perfect little family owned joint. Food was awesome! Staff was great! Highly recommend!

name: Layne Watts
text: I wish I knew the names of the folks who work here to shout them out. We stopped by on a Friday night and were their final order of that day. The margherita pizza was incredible! I'm a pizza fiend and enjoyed it greatly. I highly recommend fellow pizza fiends to check it out because it was simply full of flavor. The cannolis were excellent as well. If I'm ever back in the area, I'm definitely returning here!

name: Katie Colbert
text: Great food, reasonable prices. You will not regret treating yourself here. Pizza, pasta, salad. And the service is amazing! 🤗🍕🥗🍝🍕

name: Lori Bittle
text: Best pizza on the beach . Lovely staff . Owner Andy Joseph is hands on w his very impressive staff . Just wondering where the lovely Lori Bittle went

name: Jane Maenner
text: Pizza was full of veggies, but had little real Italian spices or herbs.  Lots of cheese though.

name: Rastalyfe Reggae
text: The best pizza in gulf shore. Me and my wife felt right at home. The Buffalo ranch Pizza is my all-time favorite

name: Shelda Deits
text: Everything is wonderful.

resp.text: Shelda, we're glad you had a great visit! We hope to see you in the future. -Devin, Manager

name: Trent Merritt
text: This is an awesome place with great people let you guys working there even though they're about to close still made me my food and cut up and joke with me the whole time I was sitting there waiting for it to get done like they've known me for years anytime I I come down here I will be going back

name: Adam Orgeron
text: Fantastic,  absolutely fantastic pizza. PSA, this isn't pizza hut or the likes. These are handmade pizzas send take time to make. It's not 30 minutes are your pizza is free. It takes a little time for them to make a large order, but OMG worth every second of wait time.

name: Katie Colbert

text: Called ordered 4 pizzas they apparently made 3 of them put them sitting to the side and said the 4th was coming it never did.. by the time they realized it my other 3 had already been sitting out on the counter 30 mins and was cold did not even attempt to store in the warmer.. there solution was to offer me a full refund(debit card could take 2 days to return to account) and me have to find food somewhere else and wait more or wait to remake all 4 pizzas together.. 1hr 45 mins later I left with my food!! While sitting there they also handed out another person's whole order to another customer so he had to wait for remake as well!! NOPE!! NOT ever again!!

name: Gary Kendrick
text:
Pizza Hut provides very good pizza and gives you great choices, as well as their wings are also good.  Some of their policies do, however, tend to make me question the thinking behind them.

The most recent one is doing away with the complimentary parmesan cheese packs making the customer pay for a small parmesan cheese shaker for a dollar if they want the parmesan cheese to go on top of their Pizza.

I also have a problem with chain pizza restaurants, like most of the main players in the chain pizza restaurants that charge a delivery fee for delivery yet that fee is not going to the drivers at all.  Pizza Hut, like many of the other major players seems to be doing away with their eat-in restaurants meaning you either have to carry it out or get it delivered so if that's going to be your main business you shouldn't be charging people extra for it making customers think the extra fee goes to the drivers because it doesn't.

If you're going to charge a fee for delivery then pass it along to your drivers and don't just add it to your bottom line.  I do like Pizza Hut pizzas but there are other places, in our area that I do like better.  I keep coming back to Pizza Hut because it's consistent, it's good, and when you crave Pizza Hut no other place will do.  Of the large pizza chain restaurants I do believe Pizza Hut delivers are provides the best product overall in their coupon specials are also good.

text: We have patronized them for 20+yrs.! We have always favored the Ultimate Supreme. We always paid $9.00, almost a year ago the price went to $12.00. When I asked why, I was told they had increased the toppings. Well they didn't lie, a lot more bell peppers, some as long as my finger and as wide as two fingers. And onions, chunks of onion, never separated, just chunks! I took one slice and picked off the onions and peppers, that amounted to a heaping hand full! What was left was a slice with a single slice of pepperoni and about 3peices of sausage and very little cheese. The pizza had no taste other than a watery taste! They should name it the vegan bell pepper and onion TASTELESS PIZZA! As long time customers, needless to say we are very dissapointed! Other pizza resteraunts are pulling similar stunts! So we will not be patronizing little Little Caesars any more! Also the most cheese and peperroni, tastes like it was made with processed cheese covered with a little mozzarella, and few if any more peperroni! It will not melt the cheese when reheated! Thank you for your PAST SERVICE!

I might live in a budget friendly not so appealing possibly dangerous neighborhood but I'm a good customer, I tip well and I appreciate the courtesy of the places I give my money.

name: Chris F. - iamd4g
text: Even their reply is fake and auto-generated like their b🤬🤬🤬t pizza and service. There will be no "next time" BOTTOM DOLLAR ON THAT. Horrible experiences at this locations but tonight's interaction burns bridges. Granted, there was inclement weather tonight so some delay and difficulties were expected. However, from what I experienced tonight, Domino's Pizza off of Mobile Hwy would have been better closed. No matter, I ordered from the app and request delivery. I finalized the order on the app but I later received a call from the store, saying they didn't have delivery drivers (again, expected difficulties) and I need to pick up my food. What they didn't tell me is that they voided my app order, placing a hold on my debit card (upcoming 'last straw'), and I would need to bring my debit card to re-order. So, when I arrived at the store, lo and behold. They told me that I needed my card. Thus, I had to drive back through Tropical Storm Sally in a partially wrecked car, just to get my debit card. (Now, given my past dealings with this store, I should have know better but I am a naive person person at times.) I get back to the store, just to find out that because of the order I made on the app, Domino's Pizza tried to charge me twice for the same order. One for delivery and the other for carryout. I snapped. So what? I need to have at least 40 dollars in my bank account to order pizza. I am sorry; your tax dollars don't pay teachers enough for that. I find it really funny that Domino's Pizza can jump into your bank account so fast when you order but, refunding and correcting orders, they feint as bumbling idiots. I do not just hold the store at fault but the entire corporation. They have no regard for customer service; Domino's Pizza only cares about profits and their shareholders. I wouldn't drop or invest a dime into Domino's Pizza, with all the dried and burnt pizzas I have ordered over the years. Hell, Pizza Hut has a hotline for situations like this, but you invest your time in 'Pizza Insurance' and 'HotSpots'. How about fairly selling pizza when trying to double dip into people's bank accounts? How about optimizing your systems so errors like this can fixed quicker? Just go under, already. But, before you do, give me my money back because YOU STILL HAVE NOT DONE THAT YET FOR A ORDER I CAN NOT EAT BECAUSE I NEVER RECEIVED IT!

resp.text: Hello Chris, I apologize for your experience and would like to assure you that this is not an automated response and your review is individually read and responded to because we want to make sure your concerns are addressed. (Maybe Domino's should consider giving their drivers a living wage so they would stay).1:40 pm, pizza finally shows up at my office. The driver gave me my now cold pizza and seemed a bit miffed that I failed to leave a tip.  Guess I'll wait two more years. EDIT: 5-23-2019 Just got off the phone with a woman who identified herself as the "manager on duty"  per the response from the "owner" I called the number listed and explained that I  was asked to call regarding my order (#19 placed 5-3-19)  but twas told there is no record of it.  Yep, great customer service.

text:
First, I am a big fan of Domino's Pizza; I will purchase it about every other week. Yesterday, I was passing through Montgomery and went to this location to get pizza and the cinnamon bread twists. The chicken and spinach pizza might as well have been just a cheese pizza; had either a piece of chicken or spinach on every other slice.

Second,  the cinnamon bread twists are usually a favorite of mine, but last night's order was horrendous. The bread twists were a quarter of the size they usually are and were hard as rocks.

This location was the dirtiest and most unpleasing Domino's I have ever been to. I highly recommend going out of your way to order from a different location.

name: Joye Perdum
text: My boyfriend and I ordered a pizza from this location tonight and ONCE AGAIN!!!! HORRIBLE SERVICE!!! I recorded both calls that I made for corporate office to hear. There is no reason this franchise should be wearing their name. As usual I ordered online and waited 30minutes for my delivery. Although the pizza tracker showed it at quality check phase (the last phase before delivery), I get a dead air call no one said anything. So I called back and get an answer from a rude Adrian screaming and cutting me off because I questioned him about waiting 30minutes to call me to tell me they don't deliver in my area after dark. In which I just received a delivery from them about a week or 2 at this hour ago so I guess it's a new policy, So why was I able to place an order and why was I charged and again 30MINUTES before you call knowing you have an online tracker indicating the steps of my delivery??????? Don't waste your time dealing with these people. It's a hit or miss on the quality of your service or if you'll get your food at all. BUT YOU WILL BE CHARGED!!!!!!This is the last my friends or family will be using them now I have to wait 2-3 business days to get my money back. This is pathetic . BEWARE!!!!!!! SHITTY SERVICE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Latiffany Thompson
text: If I could give this Dominos 0 stars I would. I was traveling through town and due to the fact I just had surgery on my ankle I didn't want to go out, so I proceeded to call this Dominos for delivery. I had to wait for 15 min for them to answer the phone and when they did they just sat the phone down while I heard them laughing in the background. I called back I asked what were the specials I was placed on hold again, after about 5 min the girl finally came back to the phone I placed my order she told me we will get it to you when we can, after an hour passed we called back and were put on hold another women came to the phone and said the delivery driver was on her way. I waited another hour and forty minutes, no pizza I proceeded to call over and over again they would not answer the phone. The 2 women that I spoke to need to be fired I waited from 3 to 7 at night and needless to say I never received my pizza. This is truly bad business and very unprofessional. I will never eat at Dominos again if this is how you allow your employees to treat customers

That was the last time I ordered from them, but it was not first time they completely dropped the ball (If you order any bread product expect to get bread with no seasoning). text: This location is so nasty. I love the one in Phenix City and I'm here visiting family and I'm like 'let's get marcos it is so good' and then this ome ended up being nasty. Super soggy and hella greasy.

name: Danielle Christopher
text: It doesn’t make sense to be open until 11pm. I specifically called at 10:30 to order a cheese pizza and the guy told me that I couldn’t over the phone and that I had to walk in. So I walk in 2 mins later and he said we’re no longer taking orders and it’s 10:35pm. He then proceeded to say that they were not taking orders at 10:30pm or later, but failed to relay that to me over the phone. Regardless it’s says they close at 11pm so why was my order not taken???

resp.text: Hi, Danielle. Please give us a chance to make it right and fill out a feedback form at www.tellmarcos.com.

text: First time ordering from here. They have the best pizza!! I love the pepperoni they use on the pizza. Will definitely be ordering again.

text: Placed and paid for pizza over the phone. Went to pick up pizza, lady said it was $3. I asked why, it was paid for over the phone. I paid the $3 but she could not explain to me why I had to pay an additional $3. Pizza was greasy!!!

resp.text: Hi, Jeff. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We're so sorry we let you down and we'd like to look into this. Please provide your contact information on our feedback form at www.tellmarcos.com

text: I ordered a pizza that never arrive because they delivered my pizza to a different location (my address was right all the time). I called them to get a refound and they told me there's nothing they can do. They just stole my money, greaaat!

resp.text: Hi, Michelle. Thank you so much for the great feedback—so glad to see it!

name: Benjamin Meade
text: They make good pizza here. This location can get very busy during game times (as expected)  but the staff could really do a much better job handling the volume and providing better customer service for people waiting.  Seems like I was more of an inconvenience than a welcome guest on a busy busy day. Otherwise they do a good job.

resp.text: Benjamin, we’re so sorry that we let you down. Please fill out a feedback form at www.marcosguestfeedback.com so we can have someone reach out to you directly and make things right.

text: Great pizza! Great staff! I went in to pick up a carryout order and the pizza was still in the oven. Guy at the counter said I could wait in the car and he would bring it to me, which he did.

text: Tasty large pizza with plenty of toppings. Price are pretty reasonable. Quite greasy and strong for me, I should try different toppings next time. I recommend this to people who likes strong taste of their pizza.

resp.text: We're so happy you had an excellent experience! Thanks for the review! We really appreciate it.

text: The pizza  was delicious! Delivery was fast! Delivery guy was friendly both times. I'm very happy with my Marcos experience and recommend it highly.

resp.text: As long as you're happy, we're happy, Cindy!

name: James Joyce
text: Though on the pricier side, Marco's is noticably better than other quick service pizza. This location is consistently great - accurate, fast, and not skimpy on toppings. I have to give credit to the owner, who I've spoken to once (on a Saturday, via his personal cell phone, of all things) after submitting some feedback about the corporate-run online ordering system. This person clearly cares about customer service and it's reflected in how well his franchise is run. My only complaint is they're not open later.

text: Went here for take-out with my two grandchildren (one in a stroller).  My order was ready when I arrived and even though we were walking the girl at the counter offered to help us carry the order to our car (she didn't know we were walking).  She was friendly and made us feel welcome.  When we got the pizza's home I thought they were a little salty, but maybe that's just Marco's style of pizza.  I'll probably go here again and would recommend it to people.

text:
This place is the worse at making pizza.  They never put enough cheese and they always overcook and we have to tare pieces apart as the cuts never go through all the way.  There are usually lots of bubbles in the dough too.
I prefer to drive across town to the other one in Alabama city.  They are extremely slow  but MOST of the time the pizza is better quality.

name: Hudson Ellis
text: Very good food. Never had a problem with any staff or food. Keep up the good work!

name: Bill Roberts
text: Always great. Fast service with hot to go and this location actually has parmesan cheese!

name: TigerFury007
text: It’s ok but cheap is cheap might as well pay the extra and get dominoes, or papa John’s. Place is only good for buying lots of pizzas for party’s coming out cheap.

name: Robert Posey
text: When I walked in the black man behind the counter just grunted. I shook it off and asked " hey, you doing ok today" nothing. I know it's loud and all plexiglass up but I said it and he heard it. Also the night before I wanted a    "Hot and ready" and they didn't have any hot and ready. Done not going to LC's again

name: James Deloe
text: Fast friendly cheap and good

name: James Witt
text: Sucked.....I feel cheap....5 dollars for disappointment

name: Hailley
text: Seems like my order is ALWAYS messed up anymore. The fella up front never gets the order right and the pizza looks terrible ! The only time my order is good anymore is when the lady manager is working during the day!

name: Skyvs van
text: I am a huge fan of Pizza Pizza! My family isn't. Recently my family went out of town and I was on my own. So of course I close Lottle Ceasar's. Getting a supreme with extra cheese. My fav. As I thought it was amazing. Then the next week I got that for myself and some cheesy bread and a pepperoni for the family. It was also amazing. Then tonight I got the same thing as last time and my supreme was really bad. I dont know what was added but it burned my mouth not by temperature but by spice. And the pepperoni pizza looked like it had been sitting there for hours. So disappointed some consistency would have been appreciated but I'm done

name: JOSH DRUMMOND
text: Good store. I'm just not a big fan of little Caesars pizza.

name: Sherry Rylander
text:
The Hot and Ready pizza is a wonderful idea. $5-$6, you walk in and get a hot pizza and walk out. Very seldom do we have to wait. The place is always clean the staff is always pleasant.
The newest addition is the thin crust pepperoni pizza. If you don’t like a lot of bread, it has just the right combination a crispy crust, the perfect amount of  sauce and lots of spicy pepperoni to make a very tasty meal. I like to dip it in ranch dressing myself. Get a large because you will eat the whole pizza.

name: Jeff Nations
text: This group of foreign workers are very rude!

name: Mizzuz Mo
text: Saturday, April 6 2019. My entire household got food poisoning from lil Caesars in Rainbow City. From the hubby to the baby. It was absolutely awful. Maybe 3 hours after eating... a little less. (Edited to spare you the details) And it was far worse for the adults. I ate for the first time today(2days later). No virus strikes the entire family simultaneously. It was definitely food poisoning.

name: Sarah Reaves
text: Pizza was great and the cashier even told me about their newest pizza. I can't wait to try it!

name: Chuck and Rachel
text: Love this place. Always quick and easy it never takes long, even if you stop in at rush time (5ish) and have to wait on your order, it's never no more than five minutes or so. I also love how sweet the boss (possibly the owner?) Is so sweet to my son. He always gives him a balloon and free cookies. He's always so kind and I've heard him asking his younger employees about their grades and encouraging them, which is very nice to see. I've never had an issue of any kind and they are open until 10 u Believe, which is also nice. It's in a super convenient location and when I use the app and preorder via the "pizza portal" it literally takes me two minutes to pick it up. If you need a budget friendly, convenient and quick dinner, this is it.

name: Lurae Morgan
text: Used pizza portal. Pizza was not ready. Had to tell women what I wanted. She said sometimes it Don't work.  Then they got pizza wrong.  And acted like it was my fault. And refused to give refund.  At that point I had been there over an hour and just wanted my money back did not want to wait 30 more minutes for wrong order.

name: dusty carroll
text: I bought pizza and crazy bread at around 5:15 tonight, and both tasted like they had been there since lunch. Horrible! Even had that sitting under a light for too long taste. Very disappointed!!

name: Thomas Gregerson
text:
The amount of time you spend at RBC location waiting for pizza has increased dramatically. When I order on their app and arrive when the app alerts me the pizza is ready, I would assume it is ready. No such luck. This is not a one time event.

Tried this place again and waited 30 minutes for cheese pizza, italian bread, and a 2 liter. Stay away unless you have all day. If I could give negative stars I would.

name: Dimika Bozeman
text: This particular location always had the best service but then they started letting the rude big man from East Gadsden come over there. We try our best to just not go when he is there. Outside of that  everyone is always very helpful and nice. They always have FRESH hot pizza ready. Most don't realize when you hear "hot and ready" that doesn't necessarily mean fresh. This location does it right! Btw their deep dish has that buttery bottom and crust that I haven't gotten with other locations.

name: Matthew Niessen
text: Surprisingly good for a budget pizza joint. Quick(ish), friendly, and never a mistake.

name: Richard Burleson
text: Fast friendly service. Like going there on weekends when I'm off work. Knowing that the wait won't be long if I order or just to pick up a ready made. Thanks 😊

name: Jake Samples
text: Never has the extra most bestest hot and ready pizza ready. Defeats the purpose of being called a hot and ready when it's never available

name: Courtney Turner
text: I've visited numerous little ceasars' restaurants and every time I get a bowl of grease, so much grease! I had to stop eating their pizza cause my stomach can't handle it, however they have good wings. When they have enough sauce anyway.

name: Kelly Slezak
text: Don't worry about calling in an order. It won't be ready. I called in a pizza and cheese bread, got the 30 minutes later and it wasn't ready. Had to wait another 10 minutes. This isn't the 1st this has happened. It seems to be a regular occurrence.

name: Marcus Davinport
text: Ordered by phone .got there and was told they sold my food because they did not know if I was coming.  Stupidity  at its finest.  You had my number. You told me it would be 15 minutes.  I got there in 17. Minutes.  Food is good. Not the best services.
